en-mt: It is required for further research into which interventions are most effective in different healthcare facilities.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: នៅក្នុងប្រទេសកំពុងអភិវឌ្ឍ ការលាងដៃជាមួយសាប៊ូគឺ ត្រូវបាន​ទទួល​​ស្គាល់ថា ការ​ប្រសិទ្ធភាព​ក្នុង​ការ​ចំណាយ ដែល​​ជា​ឧបករណ៍​ដ៏សំខាន់​ ដើម្បីទទួលបានសុខភាពល្អ និង​ការទទួល​បាន​អាហារ​រូបត្ថម្ភល្អៗផងដែរ​។
en-mt: In developing countries, washing hands with soap is recognised as cost-effective, an important tool to obtain good health and access to good nutrition.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: ប៉ុន្តែកង្វះខាតការផ្គត់ផ្គង់ទឹកស្អាត សាប៊ូ ឬកន្លែងលាងដៃ ដែលអាចទុកចិត្តបាននៅតាមផ្ទះរបស់ប្រជាជន សាលារៀន និងនៅកន្លែងធ្វើការ ធ្វើឲ្យ​មានការលំបាកក្នុង​ការសម្រេច​ឥរិយាបថ​លាងដៃ​ជាសកល។
en-mt: But the lack of supply of clean water, soap or reliable hand washing places at the homes of people, schools and at work makes it difficult to achieve global hand-washing behavior.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: ឧទាហរណ៍ កន្លែងលាងដៃនៅតាមតំបន់ដាច់ស្រយាលភាគច្រើននៅទ្វីបអាហ្វ្រិក ដែលនៅជិតកន្លែងឯកជន និងបន្ទប់ទឹកសាធារណៈគឺមិនសូវមាននោះទេ បើទោះបីមានជាជំរើសធូថ្លៃនៅក្នុងការសាងសង់កន្លែងលាងដៃក៏ដោយ។
en-mt: For example, hand washing places around most remote African areas near private spaces And public bathrooms are hardly availability, despite being a cheap option to build hand-washing facilities.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: ទោះជាយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ ក៏អត្រានៃការលាងដៃទាបនេះ អាចជាមូលហេតុបណ្ដាលមកពីការមិនទម្លាប់ក្នុងការលាងដៃ ច្រើនជាងបញ្ហាកង្វះខាតទឹក ឬក៏សាប៊ូ។
en-mt: However, this lower rate of hand washing may be the cause of hand-washing accustomy more than a lack of water or soap.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: ការលើកកម្ពស់ និងការតស៊ូមតិអំពី​ការលាងដៃ​ជាមួយ​សាប៊ូ​អាចជះឥទ្ធិពលដល់ការសម្រេចចិត្តលើ​គោលនយោបាយ​ បង្កើនការយល់ដឹងអំពី​អត្ថប្រយោជន៍​នៃការលាងដៃ និងនាំឱ្យមានការ​ផ្លាស់ប្តូរអាកប្បកិរិយា​របស់ប្រជាជនរយៈពេល​វែង។
en-mt: Promoting and advocating hand washing with soap can affect policy decisions, increase Understand the benefits of washing your hands and changing the attitude of the people long-term.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: ដើម្បីឱ្យការងារនេះមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព ការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងការវាយតម្លៃគឺចាំបាច់ណាស់។
en-mt: For this work to be effective, monitoring and evaluation is essential.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: ការពិនិត្យឡើងវិញជាប្រព័ន្ធលើការសិក្សាចំនួន 70 បានរកឃើញថា វិធីសាស្រ្តនៅតាមសហគមន៍មានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពក្នុងការបង្កើនការលាងដៃតិចតួចនៅ LMICs ខណៈដែលយុទ្ធនាការទីផ្សារសង្គមមិនមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព។ ឧទាហរណ៍មួយនៃការលើកកម្ពស់ការលាងដៃក្នុងសាលារៀនគឺ “វិធីសំខាន់បីយ៉ាង” ដោយអង្គការយូនីសេហ្វ UNICEF ដែលជំរុញដល់សាលាឲ្យអនុវត្តនូវជំហានងាយៗ និងមានតំលៃដើមទាប ដើម្បីធានាថា សិស្សានុសិស្សបានលាងដៃជាមួយសាប៊ូ ក្នុងចំណោម លក្ខខណ្ឌអនាម័យដ៏ទៃទៀត។
en-mt: A systematic review of 70 studies found that methods around the community are effective Small hand washing at LMICs while the social marketing campaign is ineffective. An example of promotion Hand-washing snakes in schools are "three important ways" by UNICEF, which urges the school to take steps Easy and low-cost to ensure that students wash their hands with soap among other hygiene conditions.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: នៅពេល​ដែលស្តង់ដារ​អប្បបរមាត្រូវ​បាន​បំពេញ​ សាលារៀន​អាចផ្លាស់ប្តូរ​ពីកម្រិត​ផ្កាយមួយទៅផ្កាយបីដែល​ខ្ពស់​បំផុត​បាន។
en-mt: Once the minimum standard is met, schools can change from one star level to the highest three stars.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: ការសាង​សង់កន្លែង​លាងដៃឱ្យបានច្រើន គឺជា​ផ្នែកមួយ​នៃ​ការ​លើក​កម្ពស់​ការលាងដៃ ដែលផ្ដល់ឱ្យ​នូវការកាត់បន្ថយ​ជំងឺឆ្លង និង​កាត់​បន្ថយ​​ការ​ស្លាប់​របស់កុមារ។
en-mt: Building more hand washing facilities is part of promoting hand washing, providing reduction in infected diseases and reducing children's deaths.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: ទិវាលាងដៃសកល គឺជាឧទាហរណ៍​មួយផ្សេង​ទៀត​នៃ​យុទ្ធនាការ​លើកកម្ពស់ការយល់ដឹង ដែលកំពុង​ព្យាយាម​សម្រេច​ឱ្យបាននូវការផ្លាស់ប្តូរឥរិយាបថ។ ជា​លទ្ធផល​នៃ​ការរីករាលដាលនៃមេរោគឆ្លងជំងឺកូរ៉ូណា ឆ្នាំ 2019-20 អង្គការយូនីសេហ្វ (UNICEF) បាន​លើកកម្ពស់​ការអនុម័ត​សញ្ញាអារម្មណ៍នៃការលាងដៃ។
en-mt: Global Handwash Day is another example of an aware-promoting campaign that is trying to achieve changes in behavior. As a result The spread of the 2019-20 Corona virus, UNICEF promoted the adoption of hand washing signs.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: ការសិក្សាមួយ​ចំនួន​តូច​បានពិចារណា​អំពី​ប្រសិទ្ធភាព​ចំណាយ​សរុបនៃ​ការលាងដៃ​នៅក្នុងប្រទេស​កំពុង​អភិវឌ្ឍដែល​មានទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយ DALYs។
en-mt: A small number of studies have considered the total cost effective costs of washing hands in developing countries with ties to DALYs.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: ប៉ុន្តែការពិនិត្យឡើងវិញមួយ បានបង្ហាញថាការលើកកម្ពស់ការលាងដៃជាមួយសាប៊ូ គឺពិតជាចំណាយតិចជាងការអន្តរាគមន៍ផ្នែកអនាម័យ​ និងទឹកដទៃទៀត។
en-mt: But a review showed that promoting hand washing with soap is actually costing less than sanitation and other water interventions.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: សារៈសំខាន់នៃការលាងដៃ គឺសម្រាប់សុខភាពរបស់មនុស្ស ហើយជាពិសេសសម្រាប់អ្នកដែលស្ថិតក្នុងស្ថានភាពដែលងាយរងគ្រោះ ដូចជា ម្តាយដែលទើបតែសម្រាលកូន ឬទាហានដែលមានរបួស​នៅក្នុងមន្ទីរពេទ្យ ត្រូវបានគេទទួលស្គាល់ជាលើកដំបូងនៅពាក់កណ្តាលសតវត្សរ៍ទី19 ដោយអ្នកត្រួសត្រាយអនាម័យដៃ ចំនួនពីរនាក់គឺ គ្រូពេទ្យ ប្រទេស Hungarian លោក Ignaz Semmelweis ដែលធ្វើការនៅ Vienna ប្រទេស Austria និងលោកស្រី Florence Nightingale ជនជាតិអង់គ្លេស “founder of modern nursing” ។
en-mt: The importance of washing your hands is for human health, and especially for those in vulnerable situations such as newly mums Childbirth or wounded soldier in the hospital was first recognized in mid-century The 19th century by two hand hygiene pioneers, Hungarian country physician Ignaz Semmelweis In Vienna, Austria and English Florence Nightingale, "founder of modern nursing".

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: នៅពេលនោះ មនុស្សភាគច្រើន​នៅតែជឿជាក់ថា​ ការ​ចម្លង​រោគ​កើតឡើងដោយសារក្លិនមិនល្អ ហៅថាមីអាម៉ាស (miasmas) ។
en-mt: At that time, most people were still convinced that contamination occurs due to a bad smell called miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: កាលពីទសវត្សឆ្នាំ 1980 ការផ្ទុះឡើង​ការឆ្លង​តាម​ចំណី​អាហារ និងការបង្ករោគទាក់ទង​នឹងការ​ថែទាំ​សុខភាព​បាន​ឲ្យនាំមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលត្រួតពិនិត្យ និង​បង្ការជំងឺ​សហរដ្ឋ​អាមេរិក ​ធ្វើការលើកកម្ពស់អនាម័យ​ដៃឱ្យ​កាន់តែសកម្ម ដែលជាមធ្យោបាយដ៏​សំខាន់​មួយក្នុង​ការការពារ​ការឆ្លង​រាលដាល។
en-mt: Dating back to the 1980s, outbreaks of food infections and health care-related infections brought troll centers U.S. disease control and prevention works to promote hand hygiene more actively, an important means of preventing epidemics.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: ក្រោយពី​មានការផ្ទុះជំងឺផ្តាសាយជ្រូកកាលពីឆ្នាំ 2009 និងជំងឺ COVID-19 ដែលរាតត្បាតជាសកលលោកក្នុងឆ្នាំ 2020 បាន​ធ្វើឱ្យ​ប្រទេស​មួយចំនួន បានដឹងថា​ការលាងដៃ​ជាមួយ​សាប៊ូ​ពិតជា​មាន​សារៈ​សំខាន់​ក្នុង​ការការពារ​ខ្លួនរបស់គេពីជំងឺឆ្លង។
en-mt: After the outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the global year-epidemic OF COVID-19 2020 has made it possible for some countries to realise that washing hands with soap is really important in protecting themselves from infected diseases.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: ឧទាហរណ៍ ផ្ទាំងរូបភាពដែលមានពាក្យ “បច្ចេកទេស​លាង​ដៃ​ឱ្យ​បាន​ត្រឹមត្រូវ” ត្រូវបានគេព្យួរ​នៅជាប់​នឹងកន្លែង​លាងដៃ​នៅក្នុង​បង្គន់​សាធារណៈ និងនៅក្នុងបង្គន់នៃអគារការិយាល័យ និង​ព្រលាន​​យន្តហោះនៅប្រទេសអាល្លឺម៉ង់។
en-mt: For example, a wallpaper with the word "technical washing technique properly" is hung next to the place Wash your hands in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: ឃ្លាថា “លាងដៃដើម្បីកម្ចាត់អ្វីមួយ” មានន័យថាការប្រកាសមិនចង់ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះរឿងមួយ ឬការចែករំលែកនៃភាពស្មុគស្មាញនៅក្នុងរឿងនោះទេ។
en-mt: The phrase "wash your hands to get rid of something" means that declaring never wants to take responsibility for a story or sharing the complexity in it.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: វាមានប្រភពចេញពីអត្ថបទគម្ពីរនៅក្នុងគម្ពីរម៉ាថាយដែលលោកប៉ុនទាសពីឡាតបានលាងដៃពីការសម្រេចចិត្តដើម្បីឆ្កាងព្រះយេស៊ូគ្រីស្ទ ប៉ុន្តែបានក្លាយជាឃ្លាមួយដែលមានការប្រើប្រាស់កាន់តែទូលំទូលាយនៅក្នុងសហគមន៍អង់គ្លេសមួយចំនួន។
en-mt: It originates from the Bible text in Matthew, where Pilate washed his hands of the decision Jesus crucifixion but has been a phrase with wider use in some British communities.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: តួអង្គម៉ាប៊ែដនៅក្នុងរឿងស្ហេកស្ពៀរចាប់ផ្តើមបង្ខំលាងដៃរបស់នាងដោយក្នុងការប៉ុនប៉ងសំអាតស្នាមប្រឡាក់នៃការស្រមើលស្រមៃដែលតំណាងឱ្យការយល់ពីទោសកំហុសរបស់នាងទាក់​ទងនឹងឧក្រិដ្ឋកម្ម ដែលនាងបានធ្វើនិងជំរុញស្វាមីឱ្យប្រព្រឹត្ត​។
en-mt: Mabid character in Shakespeare story begins to wash her hands with an attempt to clean up the stains of dreams Imagine representing an understanding of her guilt related to the crimes she made and motivated her husband to commit.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: គេបានគេរកឃើញថាមនុស្ស បន្ទាប់ពីបានចងចាំ ឬសញ្ជឹងគិតពីទង្វើដែលគ្មានសីលធម៌ នោះពួកគេមុខជាគិតពីការលាងដៃញឹកញាប់ជាងអ្នកដទៃ ហើយមុខជាផ្តល់តម្លៃដល់ឧបករណ៍លាងដៃកាន់តែច្រើនផងដែរ។
en-mt: It has been discovered that people, after remembering or reflecting on unethical actions, faces think of washing their hands more often than others, and valuing more hand-washing devices.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: លើសពីនេះទៅទៀត អ្នកដែលត្រូវបានអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យលាងដៃបន្ទាប់ពីការសញ្ជឹងគិតបែបនេះទំនងជាមិនចូលរួមក្នុង "ការលាងជម្រះភាពសៅហ្មង" ឬសកម្មភាពនៃការជួសជុលផ្សេងទៀត ដូចអ្នកស្ម័គ្រចិត្តនោះទេ។
en-mt: In addition, those allowed to wash their hands in the wake of such contemplation are unlikely to participate in "washing dirty" or other repair activities like volunteers.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: សាសនាមួយចំនួនបានអះអាងពីការលាងដៃថា គឺសម្រាប់រក្សាអនាម័យ និងជានិមិត្តរូបក្នុងគោលបំណងផ្សេងទៀត។ និមិត្តរូបនៃការលាងដៃ ដោយការប្រើប្រាស់ទឹកតែមិនប្រើសាប៊ូ គឺជាផ្នែកមួយនៃលក្ខណះពិសេសនៃការលាងដៃនៅក្នុងសាសនាមួយចំនួន បូករួមទាំង Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah និង netilat yadayim នៅ Judaism, Lavabo នៅ Christianity, និងវ៉ូឌូ (Wudhu) ក្នុង​សាសនាអ៊ីស្លាម។ សាសនាទាំងអស់នោះក៏បានបញ្ជាក់ទៀតថាត្រូវធ្វើការលាងសម្អាតដៃ ជាពិសេសក្រោយ​ពេលមានសកម្មភាពជាក់លាក់ណាមួយ។
en-mt: Some religions have claimed to wash their hands that it is for maintaining cleanliness and symbols for other purposes. The use of soap is part of hand washing features in a number of religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim at Judaism, Lavabo at Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam, all religions also emphasised that hand washing washing, especially after a specific activity.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: សាសនាហិណ្ឌូ សាសនាយូដា និងសាសនាអ៊ីស្លាមតម្រូវឱ្យលាងដៃបន្ទាប់ពីប្រើបង្គន់រួច។
en-mt: Hinduism, Judaism, and Islam require washing their hands to be used.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: ហើយហិណ្ឌូសាសនា ព្រះពុទ្ធសាសនា សាសនាស៊ីក សាសនាយូដា និងសាសនាឥស្លាមតម្រូវអោយលាងដៃមុន និងក្រោយពេលបរិភោគអាហារ។
en-mt: And Hinduism, Buddhism, Buddhism, Judaism, and Muslims require washing their hands before and after meals.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់នៅកន្លែងធ្វើការចំពោះជំងី COVID-19
en-mt: Workplace danger management for COVID-19 disease

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់នៅកន្លែងធ្វើការសម្រាប់ជំងឺ COVID-19 គឺជាការអនុវត្តវិធីសាស្រ្តសុវត្ថិភាព និងសុខភាពការងារសម្រាប់ការគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ការការពារជំងឺកូរ៉ូណាឆ្នាំ 2019 (COVID-19) ។
en-mt: Workplace Danger Management for COVID-19 is implementing safety methods And occupational health for the risk management of the 2019 Corona Disease Prevention (COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: ការត្រួតពិនិត្យគ្រោះថ្នាក់ក្នុងកន្លែងធ្វើការអាស្រ័យលើកន្លែងធ្វើការ និងការងារ ដោយផ្អែកលើការវាយតម្លៃហានិភ័យប្រភពនៃការប្រឈម ភាពធ្ងន់ធ្ងរនៃជំងឺនៅក្នុងសហគមន៍ និងកត្តាហានិភ័យរបស់បុគ្គលិកម្នាក់ៗ ដែលអាចនឹងងាយឆ្លងជំងឺ COVID-19។
en-mt: Risk monitoring in the workplace depends on the workplace and employment based on risk assessments, the source of challenges Severe diseases in the community and the risk factors of individual employees who may be susceptible to COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: នេះបើយោងតាមរដ្ឋបាលសុវត្ថិភាពការងារ និងសុខភាពសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិក (OSHA)។ ការងារប្រឈមនឹងហានិភ័យទាបមានទំនាក់ទំនងការងារតិចតួចជាមួយសាធារណជន និងអ្នករួមការងារផ្សេងទៀត ដែលត្រូវបានណែនាំឱ្យប្រើវិធានការបង្ការការឆ្លងមេរោគមូលដ្ឋាន រួមទាំងការលាងសម្អាតដៃ លើកទឹកចិត្តកម្មករឱ្យនៅផ្ទះប្រសិនបើពួកគេឈឺ អាការៈផ្លូវដង្ហើម និងរក្សាការសម្អាត និងការសម្លាប់មេរោគធម្មតានៃបរិដ្ឋានការងារ។
en-mt: This is according to the United States Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA). Low fear has little working relations with the public and other colleagues recommended Local infection prevention measures, including hand washing, encourage workers to stay at home If they are sick, respiratory conditions and maintain cleaning and the normal killing of work environments.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: ការងារប្រឈមនឹងហានិភ័យមធ្យម រួមមានអ្នកដែលត្រូវការទំនាក់ទំនងញឹកញាប់ ឬជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយមនុស្សដែលមិនស្គាល់ ឬសង្ស័យថាមានជំងឺ COVID-19 ប៉ុន្ដែអាចឆ្លងដោយសារការឆ្លងជាសហគមន៍កំពុងបន្តកើតឡើង ឬការធ្វើដំណើរលក្ខណៈអន្តរជាតិ។
en-mt: Moderate risk jobs include those who need frequent or close relations with an unknown or suspected person COVID-19 but can be transmitted because community infections are ongoing or international travel.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: នេះរាប់បញ្ចូលទាំងបុគ្គលិកដែលមានទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយសាធារណជនទូទៅដូចជានៅតាមសាលារៀនបរិស្ថានការងារដែលមានដង់ស៊ីតេប្រជាជន និងកន្លែងលក់រាយកម្រិតខ្ពស់មួយចំនួន។
en-mt: This includes staff in contact with the general public, like across schools, work environments with population density and some advanced retail spaces.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់សម្រាប់ក្រុមនេះ បន្ថែមលើវិធានការណ៍ការពារការឆ្លងមេរោគមូលដ្ឋាន រួមមានខ្យល់ចេញចូលដោយប្រើតម្រងខ្យល់ដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ របាំងក្អក និងមានឧបករណ៍ការពារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនដែលអាចប្រើបានក្នុងករណីពើបប្រទះជាមួយអ្នកដែលមានជំងឺ COVID-19។
en-mt: Risk management for this group in addition to local infection prevention measures, including air entering using air filters Highly effective, nausea masks and personal protective tools that can be used in cases of encounter with those with COVID-19.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA ចាត់ទុកបុគ្គលិកថែទាំសុខភាព និងកន្លែងបញ្ចុះសពដែលត្រូវបានគេស្គាល់ ឬសង្ស័យថាមានជំងឺ COVID-19 ស្ថិតក្នុងហានិភ័យខ្ពស់ដោយការប៉ះផ្ទាល់ដែលបង្កើនហានិភ័យប្រឈមខ្ពស់ប្រសិនបើបុគ្គលិកអនុវត្តនីតិវិធីបង្កើតអ័ក្សរ៉ូបូលឬប្រមូលឬដោះស្រាយសំណាកពីមនុស្សដែលគេស្គាល់ឬសង្ស័យថាមានជំងឺ COVID-19។
en-mt: OSHA considers health care workers and burial sites known to or suspected of COVID-19 at high risk by personal touches that increase the risk High risks if staff practice procedures to create robole axis or collect or handle samples from people known or suspected of having COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងដោយគ្រោះថ្នាក់សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកទាំងនេះរួមមានការគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មដូចជាបន្ទប់ខ្យល់ដែលមានសម្ពាធអវិជ្ជមាន និងឧបករណ៍ការពារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនសមស្របនឹងការងារ។
en-mt: Dangerous management for these staff includes administering engineering, like negative pressure rooms and personal protection devices in line with work.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: ការផ្ទុះជំងឺ COVID-19 អាចប៉ះពាល់ដល់កន្លែងធ្វើការមួយចំនួន។
en-mt: The COVID-19 outbreak could affect some workplaces.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: បុគ្គលិកអាចអវត្តមានពីការងារដោយសារតែធ្លាក់ខ្លួនឈឺ ត្រូវការមើលថែអ្នកដទៃ ឬពីការភ័យខ្លាចនៃការប៉ះពាល់ដែលអាចកើតមាន។
en-mt: Staff can be absent from work because of falling ill, needing to care for others or fear of potential impact.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: លំនាំពាណិជ្ជកម្មអាចផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ទាំងនៅក្នុងលក្ខខណ្ឌនៃអ្វីដែលទំនិញត្រូវបានទាមទារ និងមធ្យោបាយនៃការទទួលបានទំនិញទាំងនេះ (ដូចជាការដើរទិញឥវ៉ាន់នៅម៉ោងខ្ពស់បំផុត ឬតាមរយៈការដឹកជញ្ជូន ឬសេវាកម្មបើកបរ)។
en-mt: Business patterns can change both in the terms of what goods are required and the means of obtaining These goods (such as peak-hour shopping or via transportation or driving service).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: ជាចុងក្រោយ ការដឹកជញ្ជូនទំនិញពីតំបន់ភូមិសាស្ត្រដែលរងការប៉ះពាល់ធ្ងន់ធ្ងរដោយជំងឺ Covid-19 ត្រូវបានផ្អាកដំណើរការ។ ផែនការឆ្លើយតប និងការត្រៀមខ្លួនទៅនឹងជំងឺឆ្លងអាចនឹងត្រូវបានប្រើប្រាស់ ដើម្បីណែនាំពីសកម្មភាពការពារនានា។
en-mt: Finally, transportation of goods from geographical regions seriously affected by Covid-19 disease was parked Plans for response and preparation for infectious diseases may be used to guide preventive activities.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: ផែនការដោះស្រាយកម្រិតនៃហានិភ័យដែលទាក់ទងនឹងការងារ និងភារកិច្ចការងារផ្សេងៗ រួមទាំងប្រភពនៃការប៉ះពាល់ កត្តាហានិភ័យដែលកើតឡើងពីការដំឡើងផ្ទះ និងសហគមន៍ និងកត្តាហានិភ័យនៃបុគ្គលិកម្នាក់ៗដូចជាអាយុចាស់ ឬស្ថានភាពសុខភាពរ៉ាំរ៉ៃ។
en-mt: Plans address levels of risks related to work and various job tasks, including the source of risk impact It comes from home and community installations and the risk factors of individual staff, like age or chronic health conditions.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: ពួកគេក៏គូសបញ្ជាក់ការគ្រប់គ្រងដែលចាំបាច់ដើម្បីដោះស្រាយហានិភ័យទាំងនោះ និងផែនការយថាភាពសម្រាប់ស្ថានភាពដែលអាចកើតឡើងជាលទ្ធផលនៃការផ្ទុះឡើង។
en-mt: They also highlight the controls necessary to address those risks and planning that capacity for possible situations as a result of an outbreak.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: ការរៀបចំត្រៀម និងឆ្លើយតបនឹងជំងឺឆ្លងអាចជាកម្មវត្ថុនៃអនុសាសន៍ថ្នាក់ជាតិ ឬថ្នាក់ក្រោមជាតិ។
en-mt: Preparing and responding to infected diseases can be an observatory of national or subnational recommendations.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: គោលបំណងសម្រាប់ឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងការផ្ទុះឡើងរួមមានការកាត់បន្ថយការបញ្ជូនក្នុងចំណោមបុគ្គលិក ការពារមនុស្សដែលមានហានិភ័យខ្ពស់សម្រាប់ផលវិបាកសុខភាពមិនល្អ ថែរក្សាប្រតិបត្តិការអាជីវកម្ម និងកាត់បន្ថយផលប៉ះពាល់អវិជ្ជមានដល់អង្គភាពផ្សេងទៀតនៅក្នុងខ្សែសង្វាក់ផ្គត់ផ្គង់របស់ពួកគេ។
en-mt: Purposes for responding to outbreaks include reduced transmissions aide staff, protecting people at high risk for consequences Poor health maintains business operations and reduces the negative impact on other entities in their supply chains.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: ស្ថានភាពជំងឺធ្ងន់ធ្ងរនៅសហគមន៍ គឺដោយព្រោះតែអាជីវកម្ម ដែលក្នុងតំបន់ដែលរងប៉ះពាល់ ត្រូវបានធ្វើការឆ្លើយតប។
en-mt: The serving sickness of the community is because of businesses that in the affected areas are responded to.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងលំដាប់គ្រោះថ្នាក់គឺជាក្របខ័ណ្ឌមួយដែលត្រូវបានគេប្រើយ៉ាងទូលំទូលាយនៅក្នុងសុវត្ថិភាពការងារ និងសុខភាពសម្រាប់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហានិភ័យជាក្រុមដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
en-mt: Risk-order management is a framework widely used in job security and health for group risk management effectively.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: នៅពេលដែលគ្រោះថ្នាក់ COVID-19 មិនអាចលុបបំបាត់បានទេ ការគ្រប់គ្រងដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពបំផុតគឺការគ្រប់គ្រងវិស្វកម្មបន្ទាប់មកគឺការគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាល និងឧបករណ៍ការពារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនចុងក្រោយ។
en-mt: When the COVID-19 accident cannot be eradicated, the most effective management is engineering management, then administrative management and personal defense tools.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មរួមមានការញែកបុគ្គលិកចេញពីគ្រោះថ្នាក់ទាក់ទងនឹងការងារដោយមិនពឹងផ្អែកលើអាកប្បកិរិយារបស់កម្មករ និងអាចជាដំណោះស្រាយដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពចំណាយខ្ពស់បំផុតដើម្បីអនុវត្តន៍។
en-mt: Administration of engineering includes separating staff from job-related risks without relying on Worker behavior and can be the highest cost-effective solution to implementation.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: ការគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាលគឺជាការផ្លាស់ប្តូរគោលការណ៍ ឬនីតិវិធីការងារដែលតម្រូវឱ្យមានសកម្មភាពពីកម្មករបុគ្គលិក ឬនិយោជក។
en-mt: Administration is a change in principles or work procedures that require action from workers, staff or employers.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: ឧបករណ៍ការពារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន (PPE) ត្រូវបានគេចាត់ទុកថាមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពតិចជាងការគ្រប់គ្រងវិស្វកម្ម និងរដ្ឋបាល ប៉ុន្តែអាចជួយការពារការប្រឈមមួយចំនួនបាន។
en-mt: Personal protection tools (PPE) are considered less effective than engineering and administrative management, but can help prevent some challenges.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: គ្រប់ប្រភេទនៃ PPE ត្រូវតែត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសដោយផ្អែកលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់កម្មករបុគ្គលិកដែលត្រូវបានបំពាក់ឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមដែលអាចអនុវត្តបាន (ឧទាហរណ៍ឧបករណ៍ដកដង្ហើម) ពាក់ជាប់លាប់ និងត្រឹមត្រូវ ត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំ ថែទាំ និងងប្ដូរថ្មី ជាចាំបាច់ និងត្រូវបានយកចេញយ៉ាងត្រឹមត្រូវ បានសម្អាត និងរក្សាទុក ឬបោះចោលដើម្បីចៀសវាងការចម្លងរោគ។
en-mt: All types of PPE must be chosen based on harm to employees who are equipped properly as applicable (e.g. breathing devices) P Persistent and properly inspected regularly, maintenance and new switches are necessary and properly removed, cleaned and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: នេះបើយោងតាមរដ្ឋបាលសុខភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាពការងារសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិក (OSHA) ការងារប្រឈមហានិភ័យទាបមានទំនាក់ទំនងការងារតិចតួចជាមួយសាធារណជន និងអ្នករួមការងារផ្សេងទៀត។
en-mt: This, according to the United States Health and Safety Administration (OSHA), low risk jobs have minimal working relations with the public and other colleagues.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: វិធានការណ៍បង្ការការឆ្លងមេរោគដែលត្រូវបានណែនាំសម្រាប់កន្លែងធ្វើការរួមមានការលាងដៃញឹកញាប់ និងហ្មត់ចត់ លើកទឹកចិត្ដបុគ្គលិកឱ្យស្នាក់នៅផ្ទះប្រសិនបើពួកគេឈឺ អាការៈផ្លូវដង្ហើមរួមមានការក្អក និងកណ្តាស់ ផ្ដល់ក្រដាសជូតមាត់ និងធុងសម្រាម ការរៀបចំសម្រាប់ទូរគមនាគមន៍ ឬការប្តូរវេនបើចាំបាច់ មិនលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់បុគ្គលិកពីការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍ និងឧបករណ៍របស់អ្នកដទៃ និងរក្សាការសម្អាត និងការសម្លាប់មេរោគធម្មតានៃបរិយាកាសការងារ។
en-mt: Infection prevention measures introduced for workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging baby Staff to stay at home, provided they are sick, respiratory conditions including nausea and mouse, provide brushing paper Tot and vacuum, arrangements for telecommunications or turns if necessary, not encouraging staff The use of others' tools and tools and maintains cleaning and killing the normal virus of the work environment.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: ការកំណត់អត្តសញ្ញាណបុគ្គលដែលអាចឆ្លង និងការដាក់ឱ្យនៅដាច់ដោយឡែក គឺជាជំហានដ៏សំខាន់ក្នុងការការពារបុគ្គលិក អតិថិជន ភ្ញៀវ និងអ្នកដទៃទៀតនៅកន្លែងធ្វើការ។
en-mt: Identifying infected individuals and isolation is important steps in protecting employees, customers, guests and others at work.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងបង្ការជម្ងឺឆ្លង (CDC) របស់សហរដ្ឋអាមេរិកតម្រូវឱ្យបុគ្គលិក ដែលមានរោគសញ្ញានៃជំងឺផ្លូវដង្ហើមធ្ងន់ធ្ងរត្រូវតែសម្រាកនៅផ្ទះ រហូតដល់ពេលពួកគេលែងមានគ្រុនក្ដៅ រោគសញ្ញាគ្រុនក្ដៅ និងរោគសញ្ញាណាមួយផ្សេងទៀតយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ 24 ម៉ោង ដោយមិនប្រើថ្នាំកាត់បន្ថយកម្ដៅ ឬថ្នាំផ្លាស់ប្ដូររោគសញ្ញាផ្សេងទៀត ហើយគោលការណ៍ឈប់សម្រាកដោយសារជំងឺគឺអាចបត់បែន ដែលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យបុគ្គលិកស្នាក់នៅផ្ទះ ដើម្បីថែទាំសមាជិកគ្រួសារដែលឈឺ ហើយបុគ្គលិកនោះត្រូវយល់ដឹងពីគោលការណ៍ទាំងនោះ។
en-mt: The United States Centers for Infectious Control and Prevention (CDC) requires staff with symptoms of road ill health Heavy breaths must be rested at home until they are no longer developing fever, fever symptoms and another symptom It is 24 hours old without taking heat reduction medication or other symptom replacement medications, and the leave policy because of ill health is possible Flexible that allows staff to stay at home to care for sick family members, and the employee needs to understand the principles.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: បើយោងទៅតាម OSHA ការងារដែលប្រឈមនឹងហានិភ័យមធ្យមរួមមានអ្នកដែលត្រូវការទំនាក់ទំនងញឹកញាប់ ឬជិតស្និទ្ធក្នុងចម្ងាយប្រាំមួយហ្វីត (1.8 ម៉ែត) នៃមនុស្សដែលមិនស្គាល់ ឬសង្ស័យថាអ្នកជំងឺដែលមានជំងឺ COVID-19 ប៉ុន្តែអាចឆ្លងវីរុស SARS-CoV-2 ដោយសារការឆ្លងសហគមន៍កំពុងបន្តជុំវិញទីតាំងអាជីវកម្ម ឬដោយសារបុគ្គលនោះមានការធ្វើដំណើរអន្តរជាតិនាពេលថ្មីៗនេះទៅកាន់ទីតាំងមួយដែលមានការឆ្លងរាលដាលនៃជំងឺ COVID-19 ។
en-mt: According to OSHA, moderate risk jobs include those who need frequent or close relations Six feet (1.8 meters) of unknown or suspected patients with COVID-19 but can be struck SARS-CoV-2 virus due to continuing community infections around business locations or due to segments There have been recent international trips to a site where there is an epidemic of COVID-19.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: នៅក្នុងខែនេះ យើងដឹងខ្លួនថា យើងកំពុងស្ថិតនៅក្នុងស្ថានភាពគួរឱ្យចាប់អារម្មណ៍ខ្លាំង។
en-mt: This month we know that we are in a very interesting state.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: ការរាតត្បាតជំងឺ COVID-19 គឺជាអ្វីដែលបង្ហាញឱ្យឃើញច្បាស់ពីភាពទាក់ទងគ្នារវាងមនុស្ស និងពិភពលោករបស់យើង និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវដែលយើងមានចំពោះគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក។
en-mt: The COVID-19 epidemic is what clearly demonstrates the relations between humans and our globe and the responsibility we have for one another.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: យើងមិនមានគំរូសម្រាប់បញ្ហាប្រឈមរបស់វាទេ ប៉ុន្តែយើងដឹងថាការឆ្លើយតបល្អបំផុតរបស់យើងពឹងផ្អែកលើប្រភេទនៃការយល់ចិត្តពិភពលោក កិច្ចសហប្រតិបត្តិការ និងការកសាងសហគមន៍ដែលជាបេះដូងនៃអង្គភាពនេះ។
en-mt: We do not have a precedent for its challenges, but we know that our best response depends on the type of global understanding, cooperation and building a community that is the heart of the body.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: ការថតរូប និងការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ដែលយើងបានឃើញក្នុងចំណោមមិត្តរួមការងាររបស់យើងទាំងអស់តាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែល ការហៅទូរស័ព្ទ និងការជជែកគឺជាសុពលភាពគួរឱ្យកត់សម្គាល់នៃមនុស្សដែលមិនគួរឱ្យជឿដែលយើងមានសំណាងគ្រប់គ្រាន់ដើម្បីធ្វើការជាមួយ។
en-mt: Photographs and attention we have seen among all our colleagues via email, phone call Guys and chats are remarkable validity of the incredible people we are lucky enough to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: ខ្ញុំពិតជាគ្មានអ្វីដែលគួរឱ្យដឹងគុណ និងមានមោទនភាពជាងការដែលមានអ្នករាល់គ្នាជាសហការីនោះទេ។
en-mt: I have absolutely nothing more grateable and proud than to have you as a colleague.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: កាលពីសប្តាហ៍មុន មានគេមកប្រាប់ខ្ញុំថា គេមានការកោតសរសើរចំពោះការងាររបស់ពួកយើង។
en-mt: Last week, I was told that they had admiration for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: ពួកគេបានរឮកខ្ញុំតើវាមានន័យយ៉ាងណាចំពោះពិភពលោកដែលអាចងាកទៅរក Wikipedia ឥឡូវនេះ និងអ្វីដែលជានិមិត្តសញ្ញាដ៏មានឥទ្ធិពលសម្រាប់ធនធានដ៏សំខាន់នេះដើម្បីមាននៅលើអ៊ីនធឺណិត និងអាចរកបានសម្រាប់មនុស្សទាំងអស់។
en-mt: They heard to me, what does it mean for the possible Wikipedia to turn to Wikipedia now and what is the symbol Powerful signs for this vital resource to be available online and available to everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: ការងាររបស់អ្នកធ្វើឱ្យមានលទ្ធភាពនេះ មិនថាអ្នករក្សាគេហទំព័រនេះឱ្យនៅដដែល ឬមិត្តរួមការងាររបស់យើងបានបង់ប្រាក់ ឬសហគមន៍របស់យើងមានសុវត្ថិភាពទេ។
en-mt: Your work makes this possibility, whether you maintain the site intact or our colleagues paid money or our community is safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: ពិភពលោកត្រូវការព័ត៌មានដែល Wikipedia ផ្ដល់ ឥឡូវនេះច្រើនជាងពេលណាទាំងអស់។
en-mt: The globe needs the information that Wikipedia provides now more than at any time.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: នេះគឺជាពេលវេលាដែលមិនត្រឹមតែអ្វីដែលយើងធ្វើប៉ុណ្ណោះទេ ប៉ុន្តែរបៀបដែលយើងធ្វើវានឹងធ្វើឱ្យមានឥទ្ធិពលលើពិភពលោក។
en-mt: This is a time that not only does what we do, but how we do it will affect the globe.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: ដោយសារតែបេសកកម្មនេះសំខាន់ និងជាតួនាទីរបស់អ្នក យើងនឹងធ្វើការកែសម្រួលខ្លះៗទៅតាមរបៀបដែលយើងធ្វើការជាមួយគ្នា ដោយចាប់ផ្តើមនៅសប្តាហ៍ខាងមុខនេះ។
en-mt: Because of this mission and your role, we will make some adjustments in the way we work together, starting in the coming weeks.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: ការសម្របការងារ និងកាលវិភាគរបស់យើង
en-mt: Adapting our work and schedule

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: ដូចដែល Robyn បានលើកឡើងជាមុន ក្រុម C បានជួបគ្នាកាលពីយប់មិញដើម្បីពិភាក្សាអំពីវិធីសាស្រ្ត និងកាលវិភាគរបស់យើងសម្រាប់ថ្ងៃ និងខែខាងមុខនេះ។
en-mt: As Robyn mentioned in advance, Group C met last night to discuss our methods and schedules for the days and months ahead.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: នៅក្នុងការសន្ទនានោះ យើងបានពិចារណាពីអ្វីដែលយើងគិតថាជាការឆ្លើយតបសមស្របទៅនឹងអ្វីដែលយើងកំពុងប្រឈមមុខ និងវិធីល្អបំផុតដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យអង្គការមាននិរន្តរភាពក្នុងអំឡុងពេលនេះ។
en-mt: In that conversation, we considered what we consider appropriate responses to what we are facing and the best way to make organisations sustainable during this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: ច្រើនលើសលប់ យើងចង់បំបាត់ភាពតានតឹង និងគាំទ្របេសកកម្មរបស់យើងក្នុងរយៈពេលវែង។
en-mt: Overwhelmingly, we want to break the tension and support our mission over the long term.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: ប្រសិនបើអ្នកត្រូវការហៅទៅវិញ នោះមិនអីទេ។
en-mt: If you need to call back, that is okay.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក អ្នកម៉ៅការ និងបុគ្គលិកជាប់កិច្ចសន្យាទាំងអស់៖
en-mt: For all employees, contractors and staff under contract:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: ការរំពឹងទុកការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់យើងនឹងមានប្រហែល 4 ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ ឬ 20 ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៍រហូតដល់មានការជូនដំណឹងបន្ថែម។
en-mt: Our daily work expectations will be about 4 hours a day or 20 hours a week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: យើងមិនប្រកាសថ្ងៃសម្រាកទេ - ប្រសិនបើអ្នកអាចធ្វើការលើសពីម៉ោងធម្មតា បេសសកម្មនេះអាចត្រូវការអ្នក។
en-mt: We do not declare a holiday - if you can work more than normal hours, this mission might need you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: ទោះជាយ៉ាងណា ពិភពលោកមិនអាចព្យាករបានទេឥឡូវនេះ ហើយមិនថាអ្នកត្រូវការថែទាំមនុស្សជាទីស្រលាញ់របស់អ្នក ទិញគ្រឿងទេស ឬទៅជួបគ្រូពេទ្យនោះទេ សុខុមាលភាពរបស់អ្នកគឺជាអាទិភាពរបស់យើង។
en-mt: However, the globe cannot predict right now and whether you need to care for your loved ones, buy groceries or see a doctor, your wellbeing is our lead.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: យើងមិនតាមដានពេលវេលារបស់អ្នកនោះទេ។
en-mt: We are not monitoring your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: ប្រសិនបើអ្នកឈឺ សូមកុំធ្វើការ។
en-mt: If you are sick, do not work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: វាគួរតែទៅដោយមិននិយាយ ប៉ុន្តែយើងកំពុងនិយាយ។
en-mt: It should go without speaking, but we are talking.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: គ្មានថ្ងៃឈឺ ឬ PTO បានតម្រូវ - គ្រាន់តែប្រាប់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់អ្នកហើយជួយក្រុមរបស់អ្នកកែប្រែប្រតិទិននិងកាលវិភាគដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យប្រាកដថាផ្នែកសំខាន់ៗនៃការងារត្រូវបានគ្របដណ្ដប់។
en-mt: No sick day or PTO is required - just tell your manager and help your team modify the calendar and schedule to make sure that important parts of the work are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (ប្រសិនបើអ្នកធ្វើរោគវិនិច្ឆ័យឃើញមានជំងឺ COVID-19 សូមជូនដំណឹងដល់ Bryan នៅក្នុង T&C Ops ដើម្បីឱ្យ T&C អាចផ្ដល់ជំនួយ និងធ្វើឱ្យប្រាកដថាស្ថានភាពរបស់អ្នកទទួលបានការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ត្រឹមត្រូវពីថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង)។
en-mt: (If you are diagnosed with COVID-19, notify Bryan in T&C Ops so that T&C can provide assistance and make sure your condition gets proper attention from administrative classes.)

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: មនុស្សជាច្រើនម៉ោងនឹងត្រូវបានបង់ថ្លៃឱ្យពេញលេញ។
en-mt: Several hours will be charged absolutely.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: យើងបាននិយាយរួចមកហើយ ហើយយើងកំពុងប្តេជ្ញាជាថ្មីម្តងទៀត ដើម្បីគោរពតាមការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តរបស់យើងចំពោះអ្នកម៉ៅការ និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងាររៀងរាល់ម៉ោងរបស់យើង។
en-mt: We have already spoken, and we are once again committing to honor our commitments to our contractors and colleagues every hour.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: មនុស្សគ្រប់គ្នានឹងទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែតាមមូលដ្ឋាននៃម៉ោងធ្វើការធម្មតារបស់ពួកគេក្នុងកាលៈទេសៈធម្មតា។
en-mt: Everyone will get paid on the basis of their normal working hours in normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: នេះរួមបញ្ចូលទាំងប្រសិនបើអ្នកឈឺហើយមិនអាចធ្វើការបាន។
en-mt: This includes both if you are sick and cannot work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: ប្រសិនបើអ្នកធ្វើការ យើងគាំទ្រអ្នក។
en-mt: If you work we support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: មនុស្សជាច្រើនប្រើការងារជាមធ្យោបាយមួយនៃការបញ្ជូនភាពតានតឹងរបស់ពួកគេជាមួយពិភពលោកជុំវិញយើង។
en-mt: Many people use work as a means of transmitting their tension with the rest of the globe around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: អ្វីដែលយើងធ្វើអាចជារង្វាន់ដែលមិនគួរឱ្យជឿ ជាពិសេសក្នុងអំឡុងពេលដូចគ្រានេះ។
en-mt: What we do can be an unbelievable reward, especially during the same period.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: ជាថ្មីម្ដងទៀត នេះជាការថែទាំផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនរបស់អ្នក។
en-mt: Again, this is your own care.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: យើងស្នើសុំឱ្យអ្នកទាក់ទងជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់អ្នក ដើម្បីឱ្យយើងដឹងពីអ្វីដែលរំពឹងទុក និងអាចកែតម្រូវបានទៅតាមនោះដែរ។
en-mt: We ask you to contact your supervisor so that we know what is expected and can be adjusted accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: ការងារមួយចំនួត្រូវបានគេចាត់ទុកថាជាការចាំបាច់។
en-mt: Some jobs are considered essential.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: មានរឿងមួយចំនួន ដែលយើងត្រូវតែបន្ដធ្វើ។
en-mt: There are some things we have to keep doing.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: ក្រុមការងារផ្នែក SRE, HR Ops, ជំនឿទុកចិត្តនិងសុវត្ថិភាព, និងរៃអង្គាស (ក្នុងចំណោមក្រុមការងារផ្សេងទៀត) ធ្វើការងារដ៏សំខាន់ដែលអាចនឹងត្រូវការជំនួយបន្ថែម។
en-mt: The SRE, HR Ops Working Group, Trust and Safety, and Raising (additionally of other working groups) do important work that may need additional help.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: យើងនឹងចាប់ផ្តើមដំណើរការជាមួយនាយកដ្ឋានទាំងអស់ដើម្បីវាយតម្លៃគោលបំណងបច្ចុប្បន្ន និងបង្វែរការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់របស់យើងទៅគាំទ្រអ្វីដែលចាំបាច់សម្រាប់បេសកកម្មរបស់យើង។
en-mt: We will begin operating with all departments to evaluate current objectives and turn our attention to support what is needed for our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: មានកិច្ចការជាច្រើនដែលត្រូវធ្វើសម្រាប់យើងទាំងអស់គ្នាយើងគ្រាន់តែផ្តោតលើគម្រោងដែលចាំបាច់បំផុត។
en-mt: There is so much work to be done for all of us, we just focus on the most necessary projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: ការបន្ថយល្បឿនឥឡូវនឹងមិនឈឺចាប់ពេលក្រោយទេ។
en-mt: Slowing down now will not pain later.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: យើងមិនមានគម្រោង “តាមដានពីរដងទេ” នៅពេលដែលជំងឺរាតត្បាតបានកន្លងផុតទៅ។
en-mt: We have no plans to "twice track" once the pandemic has passed.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: អ្នកនឹងមិនត្រូវបានគេរំពឹងថានឹងធ្វើការបន្ថែមម៉ោងដើម្បីបំពេញតាមពេលវេលាកំណត់ដែលឥឡូវនេះមិនមានលក្ខណៈជាក់ស្តែងទេ។
en-mt: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet a time limit that is now unspecified.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: យើងទទួលយកកាលៈទេសៈដែលបានផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ ហើយនឹងធ្វើការកំណត់គោលដៅ និងបន្ទាត់ពេលវេលាថ្មីដែលសមរម្យ។
en-mt: We accept changed circumstances and will work on setting appropriate new goals and timelines.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: តើមានអ្វីកើតឡើងពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងកម្មវិធី (ផែនការប្រចាំឆ្នាំ)?
en-mt: What happens to the program (annual plan)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: ដើម្បីកែតម្រូវទៅនឹងតថភាពថ្មី និងការរំពឹងម៉ោងធ្វើការរាល់ថ្ងៃយើងមានបំណងកែសម្រួលពេលវេលាសម្រាប់ការផ្តល់ផែនការប្រចាំឆ្នាំ 2020-2021 របស់យើង។
en-mt: To adjust to new statistics and daily work hours expectations, we aim to adjust the timeline for our annual planning 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: គោលបំណងរបស់យើងគឺស្នើឱ្យមានការពន្យារផែនការឆ្នាំ 2019-2020 របស់យើងដែលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យមានពេលវេលាបន្ថែមទៀតសម្រាប់រៀបចំថវិកា ដើម្បីអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យបុគ្គលិកផ្តល់អាទិភាពលើការងារសំខាន់ៗ ថែទាំខ្លួន និងថែទាំមនុស្សជាទីស្រលាញ់ ខណៈពេលទទួលយកអ្នកដែលត្រូវការ ឬមានបំណងកាត់បន្ថយកាលវិភាគក្នុងរយៈពេលពីរបីសប្តាហ៍ខាងមុខនេះ។
en-mt: Our goal is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan, allowing additional time to prepare funds to allow individuals Kick gives priority on important work, caring for, and taking care of a loved one while accepting those in need or intending to reduce the schedule in the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: ការពន្យាពេលកំណត់ពេលវេលានេះកាត់បន្ថយយ៉ាងច្រើននូវបន្ទុកការងារផែនការបច្ចុប្បន្ន និងសម្ពាធនៅទូទាំងអង្គភាពទាំងមូល។
en-mt: This deadline extension substantially reduces the current planning workload and pressure across the entire unit.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: យើងនឹងណែនាំសំណើរបស់យើងទៅកាន់ក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាលនៅសប្តាហ៍ក្រោយ ហើយនឹងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រតិភូ និងក្រុមនៅជំហានបន្ទាប់នៅពេលយើងមានការបញ្ជាក់។
en-mt: We will introduce our proposals to the board next week and will be building delegates and groups on the next step as we have confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: សូមថ្លែងអំណរគុណចំពោះក្រុមការងារ APP សម្រាប់ការដឹកនាំរបស់អ្នកនៅក្នុងបេសកកម្មនេះ។
en-mt: Thanks to the APP team for your leader on this mission.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: ស្ថានភាពក្នុងការិយាល័យ ការប៉ពាល់ និងការសម្អាត
en-mt: Office situations, touches and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: កាលពីសប្តាហ៍មុនយើងបានដឹងថាមិត្តរួមការងារម្នាក់របស់យើងដែលមានមូលដ្ឋាននៅ SF ប្រហែលជាត្រូវបានប៉ះពាល់នឹងវីរុស COVID-19។
en-mt: Last week, we found out that an SF-based colleague may have been affected by the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: ទោះយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ យើងមានការប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នច្រើន ដោយបានជួលបុគ្គលិកសម្អាតមេរោគប្រឆាំងវីរុស ដើម្បីលាងសម្អាតទីកន្លែងទាំងអស់នៅក្នុងការិយាល័យ San Francisco។
en-mt: However, we took a lot of caution, having hired antiviral cleaning workers to wash everywhere in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: ពួកគេបានប្រើដំណោះស្រាយប្រឆាំងនឹងមេរោគនៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យដើម្បីសម្លាប់មេរោគលើគ្រប់ផ្ទៃក៏ដូចជាបន្ទប់រង់ចាំ និងធនាគារជណ្តើរយន្តចូលដល់ជាន់របស់យើង។
en-mt: They used hospital anti-virus solutions to kill viruses across all surfaces, as well as waiting rooms and elevator banks right into our floors.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: អគារនេះកំពុងប្រើប្រាស់ពិធីសារនៃកាតព្វកិច្ចថែទាំផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនដែលប្រើប្រាស់ផលិតផលដែលគាំទ្រដល់សុវត្ថិភាពរបស់ភតិកៈរបស់ពួកគេ។
en-mt: The building is using a protocol of personal care duties that use products that support the safety of their texts.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: យើងមានអារម្មណ៍ថាការិយាល័យនោះនឹងត្រូវបានរៀបចំយ៉ាងល្អនៅពេលយើងសម្រេចចិត្តវិលត្រលប់មកវិញ។
en-mt: We felt the office would be well organised when we decided to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: ការិយាល័យ DC របស់យើងមានទីតាំងនៅក្នុង WeWork ដែលត្រូវបានចែករំលែកពិធីការជំងឺ COVID-19 របស់ខ្លួនជាមួយយើង និងសមាជិកបុគ្គលិកមូលដ្ឋាន DC ទាំងអស់។
en-mt: Our DC office is located in WeWork, which shares its COVID-19 disease ceremony with us and all DC local staff members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: គិតត្រឹមសប្តាហ៍មុន ការិយាល័យ DC របស់យើងបានផ្លាស់ប្តូរទៅការរៀបចំឆ្ងាយពីចម្ងាយ ស្របតាមការណែនាំ ដែលបានចែករំលែកជាមួយនឹងទីក្រុង San Francisco។
en-mt: As of last week, our DC office changed to remote arrangements in accordance with instructions shared with the city of San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: ដូចមិត្តរួមការងារដែលមានមូលដ្ឋាននៅ NYC មួយចំនួនបានដឹងហើយយើងក៏បានពិភាក្សាអំពីការជួលទីតាំងនៅប៊្រុគ្លីន។
en-mt: As some NYC-based colleagues have known, and we also discussed renting locations in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: ការពិភាក្សាទាំងនេះកំពុងបន្ដ ប៉ុន្ដែអាចត្រូវពន្យាពេល។
en-mt: These discussions are continuing but can be postponed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: មិត្តរួមការងាររបស់យើងមួយចំនួនកំពុងធ្វើការពីចម្ងាយជាលើកដំបូង។
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the very beginning.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: អ្នកធ្វើការជាមួយគ្នាពីចម្ងាយឆ្ងាយរបស់យើងដឹងថាវាអាចជាការកែតម្រូវហើយចង់ផ្តល់ជូនអ្នកនូវដំបូន្មានខ្លះៗ៖
en-mt: Our remote workers know it can be corrective and want to give you some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: កំណត់រយៈពេលប្រជុំឱ្យបានច្រើនបំផុតត្រឹមមួយ ឬពីរម៉ោង។
en-mt: Set the meeting period as much as an hour or two.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: ប្រសិនបើមានរយៈពេលយូរជាងនេះត្រូវបានទាមទារសូមពិចារណាពីរបៀបដែលពួកគេអាចបំបែកក្នុងរយៈពេលជាច្រើនថ្ងៃ។
en-mt: If a longer period is required, consider how they can split in several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: កំណត់ពេលប្រជុំច្បាស់លាស់ មានរបៀបវារៈ និងផ្ញើសម្ភារសម្រាប់អានមកជាមុន។
en-mt: Schedule clear meetings, have an agenda and send materials for reading in advantage.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: ធ្វើវីដេអូជាលំនាំដើម ដោយប្រើឧបករណ៍ដូចជា Google Docs និង Zoom ដើម្បីសម្រួលដល់ការផ្សាយផ្ទាល់សហការ និងការតភ្ជាប់។
en-mt: Make a default video using devices, much as Google Docs and Zoom, to facilitate live broadcasts, collaboration and connections.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: ដឹកនាំដើម្បីសម្របសម្រួលរាល់ការប្រជុំ នរណាម្នាក់ដែលត្រូវ តាមដានជជែកសម្រាប់សំណួរ និងតាមដានបញ្ជីអ្នកនិយាយ និងនរណាម្នាក់ត្រូវជួយកត់ចំណាំ (ឬធ្វើការកត់ចំណាំដោយសហការ)។
en-mt: Lead to facilitate every meeting, someone who needs to follow up on a chat for questions and monitor a list of speakers and someone needs to help take notes (or take notes by collaboration).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: ផ្ញើអ៊ីម៉ែលទៅជំនួយផ្នែកបច្ចេកវិទ្យាប្រសិនបើអ្នកត្រូវការកាសស្រួលស្ដាប់។
en-mt: Email technological assistance if you need an easy-to-listen opportunity.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: ប្រើសំណងសុខភាពសម្រាប់អាហារសម្រន់។
en-mt: Use health customs for snacks.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: សូមចូលរួម #បណ្តាញពីចម្ងាយនៅក្នុងកម្មវិធី Slack ដើម្បីជជែកជាមួយមិត្តរួមការងាររបស់អ្នកអំពីការងារដែលបានធ្វើ។
en-mt: Join #បណ្តាញពីចម្ងាយនៅក្នុងកម្មវិធី Slack to chat with your colleagues about the work done.

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: ក្រុមប្រតិបត្តិការ HR កំពុងសម្លឹងទៅរកការណែនាំតាមបែបបច្ចេកទេសតាមគេហទំព័រដើម្បីគាំទ្រដល់ការកើនឡើងនៃការងារចែកចាយទូទាំងមូលនិធិ។
en-mt: The HR operating group is looking toward technical guidance across the web to support the increase in distribution work across the foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: សប្ដាហ៍មុននេះ យើងបានស្នើឱ្យអ្នកទទួលជំនួយសហគមន៍ទាំងអស់លុបចោលព្រឹត្តិការណ៍សាធារណៈដែលឧបត្ថម្ភថវិកាដោយ Wikimedia ដូចជា editathons រហូតដល់ពេលដែល WHO ប្រកាសថាការរីករាលដាលបានបញ្ចប់។
en-mt: This past week we asked all recipients of community assistance to cancel Wikimedia-sponsored public events such as editathons until the WHO declares the spread.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: យើងឱ្យពួកគេដឹងថាយើងបានយល់ថាសំណើរបស់យើងសម្រាប់ការលុបចោល និងការដាក់កម្រិតផ្សេងទៀតអាចធ្វើឱ្យវាមិនអាចទៅរួចដើម្បីបំពេញសកម្មភាពផ្តល់ជំនួយដែលបានព្រមព្រៀងហើយថាគ្មាននរណាម្នាក់នឹងត្រូវបានពិន័យចំពោះការពន្យាពេលឬកែប្រែគោលដៅទាំងនោះឡើយ។
en-mt: We let them know that we understood that our requests for cancellation and other restrictions could make it impossible to detach Full of agreed grant activities that no one will be fined for delaying or modifying those goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: សប្តាហ៍ខាងមុខនេះយើងនឹងតាមដានការណែនាំបន្ថែមស្តីពីវីគីមៀ និងសន្និសីទសហគមន៍ និងប្រធានបទក្នុងតំបន់។
en-mt: This coming week will be monitoring further guidelines on Wikimia and community plenaries and local topics.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: មនោសញ្ចេតនាទូទៅមកពីជុំវិញពិភពលោកហាក់ដូចជាមានការសោកសៅទាំងការរំខាន ប៉ុន្តែការធូរស្បើយនៅភាពច្បាស់ និងសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការផ្តោតលើសហគមន៍ផ្ទាល់របស់ពួកគេ Wikimedia និងផ្សេងទៀត។
en-mt: The general emotions from around the globe seem to be grieving both distraught, but relief at clarity and the ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and so on.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: ឆ្ពោះទៅមុខ CRT កំពុងធ្វើការបង្កើតទំព័រ Meta-Wiki ដើម្បីផ្តល់កន្លែងទំនេរសម្រាប់សហគមន៍ដើម្បីតាមដានផលប៉ះពាល់ និងតាមដានទំនាក់ទំនងរបស់យើងជាមួយពួកគេ។
en-mt: Going forward, CRT is creating a Meta-Wiki page to provide space for the community to monitor the impact and monitor our relations with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: សូមរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងជុំវិញបញ្ហាដែលទាក់ទងនឹងជំងឺ COVID-19
en-mt: Maintain contact around COVID-19 disease-related issues

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: យើងនឹងផ្ញើសេចក្ដីអញ្ជើញទៅកាន់ប្រតិទិនរបស់អ្នកសម្រាប់ថ្ងៃព្រហស្បតិ៍សប្តាហ៍ក្រោយម៉ោង 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT សម្រាប់ការប្រជុំបុគ្គលិកពិសេស។
en-mt: We will send invitations to your calendar for next Thursday week at 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: យើងនឹងប្រើពេលវេលានេះដើម្បីចែករំលែកបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព ឆ្លើយសំណួររបស់អ្នក និងចំណាយពេលវេលាមួយចំនួនប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងជាមួយគ្នា។
en-mt: We will use this time to share the current, answer your questions and spend a few time communicating with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: យើងជួបបញ្ហានេះទាំងអស់គ្នា និងនៅទីនេះដើម្បីជួយតាមលទ្ធភាពដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន។
en-mt: We get into this problem all and here to help as much as possible.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: ក្នុងពេលជាមួយគ្នានេះ អ្នកអាចបន្តស្វែងរកព័ត៌មានពីអ៊ីមែលនេះ និងព័ត៌មានសំខាន់ៗផ្សេងទៀតដែលទាក់ទងនឹង COVID-19 ទាំងអស់នៅលើគេហទំព័រ Office Wiki។
en-mt: At the same time, you can continue to search for information from this email and other important information related to ALL COVID-19 on the Office Wiki website.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT នឹងរក្សាទំព័រទាំងនេះឱ្យទាន់សម័យ ហើយព័ត៌មានទាំងអស់គឺនៅកន្លែងតែមួយ។
en-mt: CRT will kept these pages dated and all information is in the same place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: យើងកំពុងធ្វើការដើម្បីរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងជាប្រចាំជាមួយបុគ្គលិកដែលរស់នៅក្នុងប្រទេសដែលរងផលប៉ះពាល់ខ្លាំងនាពេលបច្ចុប្បន្ន។
en-mt: We are working to maintain regular relations with staff living in today's highly affected countries.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: ប្រសិនអ្នកមានសំណួរផ្សេងៗអំពីការធ្វើដំណើរ ព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ ចរន្តការងារមេចម្បងៗ បញ្ហាប្រឈមនឹងការធានារ៉ាប់រង ឬអ្វីផ្សេងទៀតដែលអ្នកត្រូវការជំនួយ សូមកុំស្ទាក់ស្ទើរនឹងជូនដំណឹង និងធ្វើការជាមួយ CRT។
en-mt: If you have any other questions about travel, events, major work currents, insurance challenges or anything else you need help, don't hesitate to alert and work with CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: យើងនៅទីនេះដើម្បីជួយផ្ដល់ការគាំទ្រ និងទំនាក់ទំនងតាមតម្រូវការ។
en-mt: We are here to help provide support and communication as needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: ប្រសិនបើអ្នកមានបញ្ហាសម្ងាត់ ឬរសើបសូមផ្ញើអ៊ីម៉ែលទៅលោក Bryan Judan នាយកអង្គការធនធានមនុស្សអន្តរជាតិ Global HR ។
en-mt: If you have a confidential problem or interview, please email Bryan Judan, director of international human resources organization Global HR.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: ការផ្លាស់ប្តូរទាំងនេះគ្មានមួយណាដែលគួរចាត់ទុកថាជាការបោះបង់ចោលការងារ និងកាតព្វកិច្ចរបស់យើងឡើយ។
en-mt: None of these changes should be seen as abandoning our jobs and obligations.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: ផ្ទុយទៅវិញពួកគេគឺជាការទទួលស្គាល់ថានៅពេលនេះការងារនិងកាតព្វកិច្ចរបស់យើងទំនងជានឹងត្រូវការសម្របខ្លួនតាមរបៀបដែលយើងមិនមានពីមុន។
en-mt: Instead, they are an acknowledgment that at the moment our jobs and obligations are more than ever going to need to adapt in ways that we didn't have before.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: ទាំងនេះគឺជាជំហានដែលយើងជឿថាចាំបាច់ដើម្បីគាំទ្រគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមកដើម្បីយើងអាចបន្តធ្វើការបាន ផ្តល់នូវចលនារបស់យើងជាមួយនឹងការគាំទ្រដែលពួកគេត្រូវការ និងពិភពលោកជាមួយនឹងសេវាកម្មដែលពួកគេពឹងផ្អែក។
en-mt: These are steps we believe are essential to supporting each other so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need and the globalisation with the services they rely.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: ការងារដែលបានគ្រោងទុករបស់យើងនឹងនៅទីនោះរង់ចាំយើងនៅពេលដែលពេលវេលាមកដល់។
en-mt: Our planned work will be there awaiting us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: សម្រាប់ពេលនេះ វាដល់ពេលដែលត្រូវគាំទ្រគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក ហើយបង្កើតកន្លែងទំនេរសម្រាប់ការងារសំខាន់ដែលនឹងត្រូវមកនៅប៉ុន្មានសប្តាហ៍ហើយមានសក្តានុពលជាច្រើនខែទៀត។
en-mt: For now, it is time to support each other and create a vacancy for important work that will be coming in some weeks and potentially for months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: យើងត្រូវការអ្នកទាំងអស់គ្នាដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យរឿងនោះកើតឡើង ហើយដូច្នេះយើងត្រូវការអ្នកទាំងអស់គ្នាថែរទាំខ្លួនឯង និងគ្រួសាររបស់អ្នកដើម្បីឱ្យអ្នកអាចនៅបានល្អបំផុតនៅពេលមានតម្រូវការ។
en-mt: We need all of you to make that happen, so we need all of you to take care of yourself and your family so that you can stay best when needed.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: ឥឡូវនេះ សូមលាងដៃរបស់អ្នក ហើយកុំប៉ះមុខរបស់អ្នក!
en-mt: Now wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 មានវត្តមាននៅក្នុងសរីរាង្គភាគច្រើន៖ ACE2 ត្រូវបានភ្ជាប់ទៅនឹងភ្នាសកោសិកានៃកោសិកាក្រពេញប្រភេទទី II សួត កោសិកានៃស្រទាប់ពោះវៀនតូច សរសៃឈាមវ៉ែន និងកោសិកាអិនដូសេលៀល និងកោសិកាសាច់ដុំរលោងនៃសរសៃឈាមក្នុងសរីរាង្គភាគច្រើន។
en-mt: ACE2 is present in most organisms: ACE2 is linked to the cell mountains of alcoholic cells Type II, the lungs of alcohol Small gastrointestinal tract, ventricles and endoscellial cells and muscle cells are smashed in most organisms.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 mRNA ក៏មានវត្តមាននៅក្នុងសម្បកក្រៅនៃខួរក្បាល striatum ក្រពេញ hypothalamus និងកោសិកាខួរក្បាលផងដែរ។
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA is also present in the outer environment of the full striatum brain, hypothalamus and brain cells.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: មុខងារចម្បងរបស់ ACE2 គឺដើរតួជាអ្នកសម្របសម្រួលតុល្យភាពតបទៅ ACE។
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is to act as a balance facilitator responding to ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE កាត់អរម៉ូនអង់ស្យូតង់ស៊ីន I ទៅក្នុងការរួមសរសៃឈាម អង់ស្យូតង់ស៊ីន II។
en-mt: ACE cuts the antennial I hormones into antisectic arteries II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 បំបែកអាស៊ីតអាមីណូ ធឺមីណល កាបូស៊ីល (carboxyl-terminal amino) ពីអង់ស្យូតង់ស៊ីនពីរ (angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe)) ហើយបំបែកវាទៅក្នុងវ៉ាសូឌីឡាទ័រអង់ស្យូតង់ស៊ីន (vasodilator angiotensin) (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH)។
en-mt: ACE2 separates carboxyl-terminal amino amino acids from two angiotensin II (Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-His-Pro-Phe) and separate it into vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ក៏អាចសម្លាប់សារធាតុប៉ិបទីត (peptides) មួយចំនួនផ្សេងទៀត រួមមាន [des-Arg9] - ឱសថ bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A និង ghrelin។
en-mt: ACE2 can also kill some other peptides, including [des-Arg9] - bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 ជួយក្នុងការកម្រិតការបញ្ជូនភ្នាសរបស់អ្នកបញ្ជូនអាមីណូអាស៊ីតណឺត SLC6A19 និងសឱ្យឃើញនៅក្នុងជំងឺរបស់ Hartnup។
en-mt: ACE2 helps limit the transmission of the amino acid transmissioner SLC6A19 and is visible in Hartnup's disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: ដោយសារមានប្រូតេអ៊ីនភ្នាសឆ្លងកាត់ ACE2 ដើរតួជាចំណុចចូលដ៏សំខាន់ទៅក្នុងកោសិកា សម្រាប់មេរោគឆ្លងមួយចំនួនរួមមាន HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (វីរុសដែលបង្កឱ្យមានជំងឺ SARS) និង SARS-CoV-2 (វីរុសដែលបង្កឱ្យមានជំងឺ COVID-19)។
en-mt: Because mountain proteins pass through ACE2 act as an important entry point into the cells for some infections, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that leads to SARS) and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that drives COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: កាន់តែច្បាស់ជាងនេះទៅទៀត ភាពបត់បែនរបស់ប្រូតេអ៊ីន S1 នៃមេរោគ SARS-CoV និង SARS-CoV2 ចូលទៅក្នុងអង់ស៊ីម ACE2 ដែលមានវត្តមាននៅលើផ្ទៃកោសិកា ដែលជាលទ្ធផលបណ្ដាលមកពីការបំបែក និងបំប្លែងទីតាំងរបស់វីរុស និងអង់ស៊ីមចូលទៅក្នុងអ៊ិនដូសូម (endosomes) ដែលស្ថិតនៅក្នុងកោសិកា។
en-mt: Even more clearly, the flexibility of the S1 proteins of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 viruses enters the ACE2 enzyme present on the surface The resulting cells result from the separation and decomposition of viruses and enzymes into endosomes located in the cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: ដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចូលនេះក៏តម្រូវឱ្យមានប្រូតេអ៊ីន S ជាចាំបាច់តាមរយៈសេរីនប្រូទីស TMPRSS2 ក្នុងខ្លួនធ្មួល ការទប់ស្កាត់ដែលកំពុងស្ថិតក្នុងការអង្កេត គឺជាវិធីព្យាបាលដែលមានសក្តានុពល។ សកម្មភាពនេះបានធ្វើឱ្យអ្នកខ្លះស្មានថា ការថយចុះកម្រិត ACE2 នៅក្នុងកោសិកាអាចជួយក្នុងការប្រយុទ្ធប្រឆាំងនឹងការឆ្លង។
