This activity has left some guessing that decreasing ACE2 levels in cells could help in the fight against infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: ទោះជាយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ អ្នកជំនាញផ្នែកសង្គម និងស្ថាប័នមួយចំនួននៅតែណែនាំឱ្យបន្តប្រើប្រាស់អ្នកបង្អាក់ ACE និងការព្យាបាលដោយ ARB។
en-mt: However, some social and organizational experts continue to advise the continued use of ACE deterrents and ARB treatments.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: ការសិក្សាតាមបែបពិនិត្យឡើងវិញជាប្រព័ន្ធ និងការវិភាគ ដែលបានចេញផ្សាយនៅថ្ងៃទី 11 ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ 2012 បានរកឃើញថា “ការប្រើប្រាស់ថ្នាំ ACE inhibitors មានទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយនិងការថយចុះ 34% នៃការប្រឈមនឹងជំងឺរលាកសួត ធៀបជាមួយអ្នកមិនប្រើប្រាស់”។
en-mt: A systematic review and analysis study released on July 11, 2012 found "use ACE inhibitors is associated with and a 34% decrease in the risk of pneumonia compared with non-users."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: ទោះជាយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ ហានិភ័យនៃជំងឺរលាកសួតត្រូវបានកាត់បន្ថយចំពោះអ្នកជំងឺ ដែលព្យាបាលដោយប្រើឱសថអ្នកបង្អាក់ ACE ដែលធ្លាប់ប្រឈមនឹងហានិភ័យនៃជំងឺរលាកសួតខ្ពស់ជាងនេះ ជាពិសេសអ្នកជំងឺដាច់សរសៃឈាមខួរក្បាល និងខ្សោយបេះដូង។
en-mt: However, the risk of pneumonia is reduced for patients treated with once-challenged ACE insulator medicine There is a higher risk of pneumonia, especially patients with stroke and cardiovascular disease.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: ការប្រើប្រាស់ថ្នាំបង្អាក់ ACE ក៏ត្រូវបានផ្សារភ្ជាប់ទៅនឹងការកាត់បន្ថយអត្រាមរណភាពទាក់ទងនឹងជំងឺរលាកសួតផងដែរ ទោះបីជាលទ្ធផលមិនសូវខ្លាំងជាងហានិភ័យនៃជំងឺរលាកសួតជារួមក៏ដោយ។
en-mt: The use of ACE intercourse is also linked to reduced death rates linked to disease Lungs, too, albeit the outcome is no longer strong than the risk of pneumonia.

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ការរួមផ្សំគ្នារវាង ACE2 (rhACE2) ត្រូវបានគេចាត់ទុកថាជាការព្យាបាលជំងឺសួតដែលមានការប៉ះពាល់ខ្លាំង ហើយវាធ្វើឱ្យមានការវិវត្តល្អនៃចរន្តឈាមនៅក្នុងសួត ក៏ដូចជាកំហាប់អុកស៊ីសែន ដែលភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹង lipopolysaccharide ដែលបណ្ដាលឱ្យមានបណ្តុំវិបត្ដិផ្លូវដង្ហើមធ្ងន់ធ្ងរ។
en-mt: The combination of ACE2 (rhACE2) is classified as a highly affected lung disease treatment and it causes good evolution of the vehicle The lungs as well as oxygen contamination linked to lipolysaccharide, which causes a severe collection of respiratory distresses.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: ពាក់កណ្តាលជីវិតនៃ rhACE2 នៅក្នុងខ្លួនមនុស្សគឺប្រហែល 10 ម៉ោង ហើយការចាប់ផ្តើមនៃសកម្មភាពគឺ 30 នាទីបន្ថែមលើរយៈពេលទទួលបានប្រសិទ្ធភាព (រយៈពេល) 24 ម៉ោង។
en-mt: Half the life of rhACE2 in the human body is about 10 hours, and the beginning of the action is an additional 30 minutes on an efficiency (period) time of 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ការរកឃើញជាច្រើនបានបង្ហាញថា ថ្នាំប្រភេទ rhACE2 អាចជាថ្នាំដ៏ជោគជ័យមួយសម្រាប់អ្នកដែលមិនអាចទ្រាំបានចំពោះអ្នករាំងខ្ទប់ប្រព័ន្ធអង់ស្យូតង់ស៊ីនរេនីនជាទម្លាប់ (អ្នករាំងខ្ទប់ RAS) ឬក្នុងជំងឺនានាដែលការធ្វើចលនារបស់អង់ស្យូតង់ស៊ីនពីរត្រូវបានបង្កើនឡើង។ rhACE2 ដែលបានបញ្ចូលត្រូវបានវាយតម្លៃនៅក្នុងការសាកល្បងព្យាបាល សម្រាប់ព្យាបាលរោគសញ្ញាផ្លូវដង្ហើមធ្ងន់ធ្ងរ។
en-mt: Many findings suggest that rhACE2-type drugs can be a successful medicine for those who cannot tolerate routine encyclical system blockers (RAS blockers) or in The diseases where two antiotine movements are increased. The incorporated rhACE2 is evaluated in a trial for treating severe respiratory symptoms.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: កម្មវិធី b'COVID-19 គឺជាកម្មវិធីទូរសព្ទដែលបង្កើតឡើងដើម្បីជួយតាមដានការប៉ះពាល់គ្នា ឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងការឆ្លងរាលដាលជាសកលនៃវីរុសកូរ៉ូណាក្នុងឆ្នាំ 2019-20 ឧទាហរណ៍ ដំណើរការកំណត់អត្តសញ្ញាណមនុស្ស ដែលបានទាក់ទងជាមួយអ្នកដែលបានឆ្លងជំងឺ។
en-mt: The b'COVID-19 application is a phone application created to help monitor impacts responding to epidemics The universe of cholera in 2019-20, for example, identifying people who have contacted those who have been infected.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: ការដាក់ពាក្យសុំជាច្រើនត្រូវបានស្នើ ឬធ្វើឡើង ដោយមានការគាំទ្រជាផ្លូវការពីរដ្ឋាភិបាលក្នុងតំបន់មួយចំនួន និងយុត្តាធិការមួយចំនួន។
en-mt: Many applications have been requested or made with the official support of governments in some regions and a number of judicial secretaries.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: ក្របខ័ណ្ឌជាច្រើន​សម្រាប់ការ​បង្កើត​កម្មវិធី​តាមដាន​ការប៉ះពាល់​ត្រូវ​បានអភិវឌ្ឍ។
en-mt: Many frameworks for creating impact tracking software have been developed.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: ការព្រួយបារម្ភអំពីឯកជនភាពត្រូវបានលើកឡើង ជាពិសេសអំពីប្រព័ន្ធដែលផ្អែកលើការតាមដានទីតាំងភូមិសាស្ត្ររបស់អ្នកប្រើកម្មវិធី។
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems based on tracking the geographical location of software users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ជម្រើសសម្រាប់ការជ្រៀតដែលមិនសូវកើតឡើង រួមបញ្ចូលការប្រើប្រាស់រលកសញ្ញាប៊្លូធូស ដើម្បីកត់ត្រាចម្ងាយនៅជិតទូរសព្ទដៃផ្សេងទៀតរបស់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់ណាម្នាក់។
en-mt: Options for poorer interference include using Bluetooth certificate waves to record distant near another handset of any user.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 10 ខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន Google និង Apple បានប្រកាសរួមគ្នាថាពួកគេនឹងរួមបញ្ចូលមុខងារ ដើម្បីគាំទ្រកម្មវិធី ដែលពឹងផ្អែកលើប៊្លូធូសដោយផ្ទាល់ទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការ Android និង iOS របស់ពួកគេ។
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would include functions to support Bluetooth-based applications directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: នៅប្រទេសចិន រដ្ឋាភិបាលចិន រួមសហការជាមួយ Alipay បានដាក់ឱ្យប្រើកម្មវិធីមួយ ដែលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យពលរដ្ឋពិនិត្យមើលថាតើពួកគេបានប៉ះពាល់ជាមួយអ្នកដែលមានជំងឺ COVID-19 ឬអត់។
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, in collaboration with Alipay, has launched an app that allows citizens to check whether they have contacted those with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: វាត្រូវបានដាក់ឲ្យប្រើប្រាស់នៅច្រើនជាង 200 ទីក្រុងក្នុងប្រទេសចិន ហើយនៅក្នុងប្រទេសសិង្ហបុរី កម្មវិធីឈ្មោះ TraceTogether កំពុងត្រូវបានប្រើប្រាស់។
en-mt: It is introduced in more than 200 cities in China, and in Singapore, the TraceTogether program is being used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: កម្មវិធីត្រូវបានអភិវឌ្ឍដោយសហគមន៍បច្ចេកវិទ្យាក្នុងស្រុកដែលចេញផ្សាយដោយបើកចំហ ហើយនឹងត្រូវប្រគល់ឱ្យរដ្ឋាភិបាល។ ក្រុង North Macedonia បានដាក់ឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់នូវកម្មវិធី "StopKorona!" ដែលជាកម្មវិធីប្រើប្រាស់ប៊្លូធូស ដើម្បីតាមដានការប៉ះពាល់ជាមួយអ្នកដែលអាចមានមេរោគ ហើយផ្តល់ការឆ្លើយតបយ៉ាងរហ័សទៅអាជ្ញាធរសុខាភិបាល។
en-mt: Programs have been developed by the openly released local technology community and will be handed over to the government. The "StopKorona!" procedure, a Bluetooth usage program to monitor contact with those who may be virused and provide a quick response to health authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: កម្មវិធីនេះត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងដោយក្រសួងទំនាក់ទំនង និងបច្ចេកវិទ្យា និងក្រសួងសុខាភិបាល។
en-mt: The program was created by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 14 ខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 កម្មវិធីទូរសព្ទរង់ចាំការអនុម័តពីក្រុមហ៊ុន Google Play Store និង Apple App Store។
en-mt: On April 14, 2020, a mobile app awaits approval from Google Play Store and Apple App Store companies.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 12 ខែមេសា រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលបានបញ្ជាក់ថា កម្មវិធីតាមដានការប៉ះពាល់គ្នាកំពុងស្ថិតក្នុងដំណាក់កាលអភិវឌ្ឍ ហើយនឹងត្រូវដាក់ឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់នៅប៉ុន្មានសប្តាហ៍ខាងមុខទៀត។ កម្មវិធីស្រដៀងគ្នានេះត្រូវបានគ្រោងទុកនៅប្រទេសអៀរឡង់ និងបារាំង ("StopCovid")។
en-mt: On April 12, the government confirmed that the impact tracker is in the development phase and will be put in place Use in the next few weeks. Similar programs are planned in Ireland and France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: ប្រទេសអូស្ត្រាលី និងប្រទេសនូវែលសេឡង់កំពុងពិចារណា​ប្រើប្រាស់​កម្មវិធីតាមលំនាំកម្មវិធី TraceTogether និងពិធីការ BlueTrace របស់​ប្រទេសសិង្ហបុរី។ ប្រទេសរុស្ស៊ី​មានបំណងដាក់​ឲ្យប្រើប្រាស់​នូវកម្មវិធី​របាំងការពារភូមិសាស្ត្រ សម្រាប់អ្នកជំងឺ​ដែលបានទទួលការ​ធ្វើ​រោគ​វិនិច្ឆ័យឃើញមានជំងឺ COVID-19 ដែលកំពុងរស់នៅក្នុងទីក្រុងមូស្គូ ដែល​កម្មវិធីនេះត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើង ដើម្បីធានាថាពួកគេមិនចាកចេញពីផ្ទះ។
en-mt: Australia and New Celand are considering using applications according to TraceTo software Gether and Singapore's BlueTrace protocol. Russia aims to make use of applications Geographical protection barriers for patients who received diagnoses of spilled COVID-19 Nong lives in Moscow, where it was created to ensure they do not leave their homes.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: លោក Ross Anderson សាស្រ្តាចារ្យផ្នែកសុវត្ថិភាពវិស្វកម្មនៃសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ Cambridge បានចុះចំនួនបញ្ហាជាក់ស្តែងដែលអាចកើតឡើងជាមួយនឹងកម្មវិធីដែលផ្អែកលើប្រព័ន្ធ ដោយរាប់បញ្ចូលទាំងករណីវិជ្ជមានខុសពីការពិត និងកង្វះប្រសិទ្ធភាព ប្រសិនបើយកកម្មវិធីនេះទៅប្រើប្រាស់លើប្រជាជនមួយភាគតូច។
en-mt: Ross Anderson, professor of engineering safety at Cambridge University, decreased the actual number of problems that could occur with activities A system-based procedure, including positive cases, differs from facts and lack of efficiency if it is used to a small minority of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: ដើម្បីដោះស្រាយកង្វល់អំពីការរីករាលដាលនៃកម្មវិធី “វីរុសកូរ៉ូណា” ដែលបង្កការភាន់ច្រឡំ ឬបង្កគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ក្រុមហ៊ុន Apple បានដាក់កម្រិតលើប្រភេទស្ថាប័នដែលអាចបញ្ចូលកម្មវិធី ទាក់ទងនឹងវីរុសកូរ៉ូណាទៅក្នុង App Store របស់ខ្លួន ដោយដាក់កម្រិតឱ្យតែលក្ខខណ្ឌ “ផ្លូវការ” ឬស្ថាប័នដែលមានឈ្មោះល្បីតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
en-mt: To address concerns about the spread of the "Corona" program that causes illusion or harm, Apple has restricted the building type Engines that can integrate cholera-related applications into their App Store by restricting only "official" or well-known organisations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.

en-mt: Privacy campaigners have expressed concern about the impact of large-scale surveillance using the Corona virus program, especially that Whether the surveillance infrastructure created to tackle the pandemic will be dismissed when there is no threat.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: អង្គការលើកលែងទោសអន្តរជាតិ និងអង្គការជាង 100 ផ្សេងទៀតបានចេញសេចក្តីថ្លែងការណ៍មួយដោយអំពាវនាវឱ្យមានដែនកំណត់លើប្រភេទនៃការតាមដាននេះ។
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organisations issued a statement calling for limits on the type of monitoring.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:

en-mt: The institutions have announced eight conditions on government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ការបន្តការតាមដាន និងការឃ្លាំមើលនឹងត្រូវមានបទប្បញ្ញត្តិអំពីការបញ្ឈប់សុពលភាព។
en-mt: Continuing monitoring and surveillance will have to have regulations about stopping validity.

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;

en-mt: The use of data will be determined for the purposes of COVID-19 disease

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;

en-mt: Digital watches will be avoided discriminatory and difficult encounters.

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;

en-mt: Every data sharing with a third party will be stipulated in the law.

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ត្រូវតែមានការការពារប្រឆាំងនឹងការរំលោភបំពាន និងសិទ្ធិរបស់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋក្នុងការឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងការរំលោភបំពានណាមួយ។

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).

en-mt: However, not every system with a central center must be connected to and the location data of someone. The system's lobby is created to be used to only one central center in communication (see below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: នៅក្នុងប្រទេស​កូរ៉េខាងត្បូង ប្រព័ន្ធដែល​មិនអាស្រ័យ​លើកម្មវិធី​ត្រូវ​បាន​ប្រើដើម្បីអនុវត្តការតាមដានការប៉ះពាល់។

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: ជំនួសឱ្យការប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីទូរសព្ទ ប្រព័ន្ធនេះបានប្រមូលព័ត៌មានពីប្រភពផ្សេងៗ ដោយរួមបញ្ចូលទាំងឧបករណ៍ចល័តដែលតាមដានទិន្នន័យ និងទិន្នន័យប្រតិបត្តិការរបស់បណ្ណ និងបានរួមបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យទាំងនេះចូលគ្នា ដើម្បីបង្កើតបានជាការជូនដំណឹងតាមរយៈសារទូរសព្ទ ដែលផ្ញើទៅកាន់បុគ្គលដែលអាចនឹងឆ្លងមេរោគ។
en-mt: Instead of using phone applications, the system has collected information from a variety of sources, including mobile devices that track data and feedback data The card operations and included these data together to create notifications via telephone messages sent to individuals who may be infected.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: ក្រៅពីការប្រើប្រាស់ព័ត៌មាននេះ ដើម្បីជូនដំណឹងអំពីទំនាក់ទំនងដែលចំាបាច់ រដ្ឋាភិបាលក៏បានធ្វើឱ្យព័ត៌មានអំពីទីតាំងនេះផ្សាយជាសាធារណៈ ជាអ្វីដែលត្រូវបានអនុញ្ញាតដោយសារតែការផ្លាស់ប្តូរយ៉ាងខ្លាំងនៃច្បាប់ស្តីពីឯកជនភាពព័ត៌មាន បន្ទាប់ពីការផ្ទុះ MERS នៅក្នុងប្រទេសនោះ។

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ការតាមដានការរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងជាឯកជនគឺជាគោលគំនិតដែលបង្កើតឡើងដ៏ល្អ ដោយមានការសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវសំខាន់ៗតាំងពីឆ្នាំ 2013 មកម៉្លេះ។ ចាប់ពីថ្ងៃទី 7 ខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមអ្នកជំនាញជាច្រើននាក់បានធ្វើការសិក្សាទៅលើដំណោះស្រាយដែលសមស្របសម្រាប់ឯកជនភាព ដូចជាការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រព័ន្ធ Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ដើម្បីកត់ត្រាចម្ងាយនៅជិតទូរសព្ទដៃផ្សេងទៀតរបស់អ្នកប្រើប្រាស់ណាម្នាក់។

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: ក្រុមឯកជនមួយនៅ MIT Media Lab បានបង្កើតនូវ SafePaths ដែលជាទម្រង់កម្មវិធីសម្រាប់ប្រើបច្ចេកវិទ្យាការពារឯកជនភាពនៅពេលប្រមូល និងប្រើប្រាស់ទិន្នន័យទីតាំង ឬទិន្នន័យផ្លូវបំបែក ដើម្បីតាមដានការរីករាលដាលនៃជំងឺ COVID-19។
en-mt: A private group at MIT Media Lab has developed SafePaths, a form of software for privacy protection technology When collecting and using location data or separated road data to track the spread of COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: វាផ្អែកលើការស្រាវជ្រាវពីរបាយការណ៍ជាផ្លូវការ “កម្មវិធីប្រែជាប្រើខុសគោលដៅ៖ ការរក្សាភាពឯកជនផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនក្នុងការរីករាលដាល” ដែលចេញផ្សាយនៅខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020។ កិច្ចខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងស្រដៀងគ្នាមួយទៀតគឺវេទិកា SafeTrace ដោយ Enigma MPC ដែលជាក្រុមហ៊ុនអភិវឌ្ឍបច្ចេកវិទ្យាភាពឯកជន ដែលត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងដំបូងនៅឯ MIT Media Lab។
en-mt: It is based on two official reports," "Applications Misuse Targets: Preserving Personal Privacy in Proliferation," released in March 2020. Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a private technology development company originally founded at MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.

targetString: លោក Hussein A A, et al បានសិក្សាអំពីបេក្ខភាពសមាសធាតុជាច្រើនដែលបន្ទាប់មកបានធ្វើឱ្យភាពស្រដៀងគ្នានៃគ្រោងឆ្អឹងរបស់ពួកវាបានប្រសើរឡើង និងវិភាគដោយប្រើថ្នាំស្រដៀងគ្នាបំផុតដែលត្រូវបានអនុញ្ញាត ដើម្បីពន្លឿនការអភិវឌ្ឍថ្នាំប្រឆាំងនឹង SARS-CoV-2 ដ៏មានឥទ្ធិពលនៅក្នុងការសិក្សាបឋមរបស់គាត់ ដើម្បីណែនាំនៅក្នុងការរចនាការសិក្សាគ្លីនិក។

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: ក្លូរ៉ូឃ្វីន (Chloroquine) គឺជាឱសថប្រឆាំងនឹងជំងឺគ្រុនចាញ់ ដែលគេក៏បានយកមកប្រើប្រាស់ ដើម្បីប្រឆាំងទៅនឹងជំងឺស្វ័យភាពស៊ាំមួយចំនួនផងដែរ។
en-mt: Chloroquine is a medicine against malaria, which is also used to fight a number of immune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 18 ខែមីនា អង្គការសុខភាពពិភពលោក​បាន​ប្រកាសថា ឱសថក្លូរ៉ូគីន (chloroquine) និងឱសថអ៊ីដ្រុកស៊ីក្លូរ៉ូគីន (hydroxychloroquine) ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹង​ស្ថិតក្នុង​ចំណោមឱសថ​ចំនួន​បួនមុខ ដែលត្រូវបានសិក្សាជាផ្នែកនៃការសាកល្បងព្យាបាលសាមគ្គី។
en-mt: On March 18, the People's Health Organisation declared chloroquine and hydrochloquine (hydroxychloroquine) involved will be among four medicines studied as part of the solidarity trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: អភិបាលក្រុងញូវយ៉ក លោក អានដ្រូ គួម៉ូ បានប្រកាសថាការសាកល្បងរបស់រដ្ឋញូវយ៉កនូវថ្នាំ chloroquine និង hydroxychloroquine នឹងចាប់ផ្តើមនៅថ្ងៃទី 24 ខែមីនា។ នៅថ្ងៃទី 28 ខែមីនា FDA បានអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់ hydroxychloroquine sulfate និង chloroquine phosphate ក្រោមការអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់ជាបន្ទាន់ (EUA)។
en-mt: New York City Mayor Andro Kumu has announced that New York State's trial of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine will begin on March 24 On March 28, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under the authorization of emergency use (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: ការព្យាបាលនេះមិនត្រូវបានអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់នៅក្នុងដំណាក់កាលនៃការព្យាបាលសាកល្បងរបស់ FDA នោះទេ ហើយសិទ្ធិអំណាចទាំងអស់ស្ថិតនៅក្រោម EUA តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ការពិសោធក្នុងការព្យាបាលនេះគឺអាចធ្វើឡើងបានចំពោះតែអ្នកជំងឺដែលត្រូវសង្គ្រោះបន្ទាន់នៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ហើយមិនអាចអនុវត្តការព្យាបាលនេះនៅក្នុងការព្យាបាលសាកល្បងនោះទេ។
en-mt: This therapy is not allowed to be used in the FDA's trial phase, and all authority only under the EUA, drinking This in treatment is only possible to patients who have to be emergency at the hospital and cannot apply this in trial.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC បាននិយាយថា “ការប្រើប្រាស់កម្រិតដូស ឬរយៈពេលនៃ ថ្នាំ hydroxychloroquine សម្រាប់វិធីការពារជំងឺ ឬការព្យាបាលការឆ្លងមេរោគ SARS-CoV-2” មិនទាន់បានបង្កើតឡើងនៅឡើយទេ។
en-mt: The CDC says that "the use of dose or duration of the drug hydroxychloroquine for disease prevention or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infections" has not yet been developed.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតបាននិយាយថា ពួកគេកំពុងប្រើឱសថ នៅពេលដែល "គ្មានជម្រើសផ្សេងទៀត"។
en-mt: The doctor said they were taking medicine when there was "no other option."

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: ក្រុមអ្នកស្រាវជ្រាវជនជាតិតួកគី នៅទីក្រុងអ៊ីស្តង់ប៊ុលកំពុងធ្វើការសិក្សាតូចមួយស្តីពីការប្រើប្រាស់ថ្នាំ chloroquine រួមជាមួយនឹងស័ង្កសី វីតាមីនអេ វីតាមីនស៊ី និងវីតាមីនឌី។
en-mt: A team of Turkish researchers in Istan is conducting a small study on use Use chloroquine, along with zinc, vitaminSA, vitamins, and vitamins.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: ការសិក្សាធំៗកំពុងធ្វើឡើងនៅសាកលវិទ្យាល័យឌូក និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យអ័កស្វឺដ។
en-mt: Mainstream studies are taking place at Duke University and Okwerd University.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: សាលា NYU Langone Medical School បានដឹកនាំការធ្វើតេស្តសាកល្បងអំពីសុវត្ថិភាព ប្រសិទ្ធភាពនៃប្រើប្រាស់ឱសថ hydroxychloroquine សម្រាប់បង្ការ។
en-mt: NYU Langone Medical School has led a safety test of the use of hydroxychloroquine medicine for prevention.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: ការសាកល្បងការព្យាបាលរបស់ប្រទេសចិននៅក្នុងទីក្រុងវូហាន និងហ្សេនជិនបានអះអាងបង្ហាញថា ឱសថហ្វេវីពីរ៉ាវៀ (favipiravir ) “មានប្រសិទ្ធភាពយ៉ាងពិតប្រាកដ”។
en-mt: Chinese treatment trials in Wuhan and Zheng have claimed that favipiravir pharmaceuticals are "genuinely effective."

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: អ្នកជំងឺ 35 នាក់នៅទីក្រុងសិនជិនបានធ្វើតេស្តអវិជ្ជមានក្នុងរយៈពេលមេដ្យាន 4 ថ្ងៃ ខណៈពេលដែលរយៈពេលនៃជំងឺគឺ 11 ថ្ងៃក្នុងខ្លួនអ្នកជំងឺ 45 នាក់ដែលមិនបានទទួលវា។
en-mt: The 35 patients in Xenchen tested negative within 4 days, while the length of the disease was 11 days inside the 45 patients who did not receive it.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: ក្នុងការសិក្សាមួយដែលធ្វើឡើងនៅទីក្រុងវូហានលើអ្នកជំងឺ 240 នាក់ដែលមានជំងឺរលាកសួត គេបានផ្ដល់ថ្នាំ favipiravir ដល់មនុស្សពាក់កណ្តាល ហើយពាក់កណ្តាលទៀតបានទទួលថ្នាំ umifenovir។
en-mt: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, favipiravir was given to half the people and half received the drug umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: ទីភ្នាក់ងារឱសថអ៊ីតាលីបានរំលឹកដល់សាធារណជនថា ភស្តុតាងមានស្រាប់ដែលគាំទ្រចំពោះថ្នាំនេះគឺមិនគ្រប់គ្រាន់ទេ និងមានលក្ខណៈបឋមនៅឡើយ។
en-mt: The Italian Medicines Agency reminded the public that existing evidence supporting the drug was insufficient and still basic.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 2 ខែមេសា ប្រទេសអាល្លឺម៉ង់បានប្រកាសថា ខ្លួន​នឹង​ទិញ​ថ្នាំ​ពីប្រទេសជប៉ុនសម្រាប់ការស្តុកទុករបស់ខ្លួន ហើយប្រើយោធា​ដើម្បី​បញ្ជូនថ្នាំនេះទៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ជា​ទីកន្លែង​ដែល​ថ្នាំ​នេះ​​នឹងត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ដើម្បីព្យាបាលអ្នកជំងឺ COVID-19 ។
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced it would buy medicine from Japan for its stockpile and use the military to Send the drug to the University Hospital, where it will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: យោងទៅតាមកាសែត South China Morning បានឱ្យដឹងថា លោក Shinzo Abe បានធ្វើឲ្យរដ្ឋបាលរបស់លោក Trump ទទួលទិញថ្នាំមួយប្រភេទដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពតិចក្នុងការព្យាបាលករណីជំងឺធ្ងន់ធ្ងរ ដោយសារវាបានបំប្លែងខ្លួនរួចរាល់បាត់ទៅហើយ។
en-mt: According to The South China Morning, Shinzo Abe made Trump's administration acquire drugs One type that is less effective at treating a service case, as it is already detached.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: សម្រាប់ស្ត្រីមានផ្ទៃពោះ ឬអ្នកដែលព្យាយាមចង់មានផ្ទៃពោះ វាប្រហែលជាមិនមានសុវត្ថិភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ទេ។
en-mt: For pregnant women or those who try to get pregnant, it may not be safe to use.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: ការសិក្សាមួយអំពីថ្នាំ lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra) ដែលជាការរួមបញ្ចូលគ្នានៃថ្នាំ lopinavir និងថ្នាំ ritonavir បានសន្និដ្ឋានថា "គ្មានអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ណាមួយត្រូវបានគេសង្កេតឃើញទេ"។
en-mt: A study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of lopinavir and ritonavir drugs, concluded that "no benefits have been observed."

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: ឱសថដែលគេបានផលិតឡើង ដើម្បីរារាំងវីរុស HIV ពីការបំបែកខ្លួនតាមរយៈការចងភ្ជាប់ទៅនឹងអង់ស៊ីមប្រូទីស។
en-mt: Medicine developed to prevent the HIV virus from separating by binding to enzymes.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: ក្រុមអ្នកស្រាវជ្រាវនៅសាកលវិទ្យាល័យខូឡូរ៉ាដូកំពុងព្យាយាមកែប្រែថ្នាំ ដើម្បីរកសមាសធាតុផ្សំដែលនឹងភ្ជាប់ជាមួយអង់ស៊ីមប្រូទីសរបស់ SARS-CoV-2។ មានការរិះគន់នៅក្នុងសហគមន៍វិទ្យាសាស្ត្រអំពីការណែនាំធនធានទៅនឹងថ្នាំដែលត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងជាពិសេសសម្រាប់មេរោគអេដស៏។
en-mt: University of Colorado researchers are trying to modify drugs to find compounds that will link up with SARS's enzymes There has been criticism in the scientific community of the guidance of resources to drugs created especially for AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: អង្គការសុខភាពពិភពលោកបានដាក់បញ្ចូលឱសថ lopinavir / ritonavir នៅក្នុងការធ្វើតេស្តសាកល្បងរួមគ្នាជាលក្ខណៈអន្តរជាតិ។
en-mt: The People's Health Organisation has included lopinavir / ritonavir medicine in international tests.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: ឱសថ Remdesivir នេះត្រូវបានបង្កើត និងអភិវឌ្ឍដោយអ្នកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រ Gilead សម្រាប់ធ្វើការព្យាបាលវីរុស Ebola និងវីរុស Marburg។ អ្នកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រ Gilead ក៏បានរកឃើញថាឱសថ Remdesivir មានសកម្មភាពក្នុងការប្រឆាំងទល់នឹងវីរុសហ្វ៊ីឡូ ញូម៉ូ ប៉ារ៉ាមីសូ និងកូរ៉ូណាជាច្រើននៅក្នុងបន្ទប់ពិសោធន៍។
en-mt: This remdesivir medicine has been developed and developed by Gilead scientists for the treatment of Ebola and Marburg. Thead also found that Remdesivir medicine was active in fighting physical viruses, Nomo, Paramiso and many coronas in the laboratory.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: នៅចុងខែកុម្ភៈ ឆ្នាំ 2020 អង្គការសុខភាពពិភពលោកបានឱ្យដឹងថា ខ្លួនមិនរំពឹងថានឹងមានវ៉ាក់សាំងប្រឆាំងនឹងវីរុស SARS-CoV-2 ដែលជាវីរុសបង្កឱ្យមានការស្លាប់ ក្នុងរយៈពេលតិចជាង 18 ខែនោះទេ។
en-mt: By the end of February 2020, the People's Health Organisation revealed it did not expect to have a vaccine The SARS-CoV-2 virus causes death in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: បេក្ខភាពថ្នាំវ៉ាក់សាំងចំនួនប្រាំមុខស្ថិតក្នុងដំណាក់កាលទីមួយនៃការសិក្សាពីសុវត្ថិភាពកាលពីខែមេសា។
en-mt: Five vaccines candidates were in the forefront phase of a safety study in April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: ជំងឺ COVID-19 ត្រូវបានកំណត់អត្តសញ្ញាណនៅខែធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ 2019។
en-mt: COVID-19 disease was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ការផ្ទុះឡើងដ៏ធំមួយបានរាលដាលពាសពេញពិភពលោកនៅឆ្នាំ 2020 ដែលនាំឱ្យមានការវិនិយោគ និងសកម្មភាពស្រាវជ្រាវយ៉ាងច្រើនដើម្បីបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំង។
en-mt: A major outbreak spread around the globe in 2020, leading to huge investment and research activities to create a vaccine.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ស្ថាប័នជាច្រើនកំពុងប្រើហ្សែនដែលត្រូវបានផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដើម្បីបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំងដែលអាចប្រឆាំងនឹង SARS-CoV-2។
en-mt: Many organisations are using genes that have been advertised to create vaccines that can fight SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: សកម្មភាពចាំបាច់នៃគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម CEPI សម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងដែលបានចែងនៅក្នុងខែមេសាគឺ ល្បឿន សមត្ថភាព ផលិតកម្ម ការដាក់ពង្រាយតាមទំហំ និងការចូលជាសកល។
en-mt: The necessary action of the CEPI initiative for the development of the vaccine stipulated in April is speed, production capabilities, deployment by size and global entry.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ក្នុងខែមេសា អ្នកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រមកពី CEPI បានរាយការណ៍ថាមានវេទិកាបច្ចេកវិទ្យាចំនួន 10 ផ្សេងៗគ្នាបានស្ថិតនៅក្រោមការស្រាវជ្រាវ និងអភិវឌ្ឍនៅដើមឆ្នាំ 2020 ដើម្បីបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំងដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពប្រឆាំងនឹងជំងឺ COVID-19។
en-mt: In April, scientists from CEPI reported that 10 different technological platforms went under Research and development in early 2020 to develop an effective vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: គោលដៅនៃទម្រង់ចម្បងៗដែលបានឈានដល់ការស្រាវជ្រាវផ្នែកសុវត្ថិភាពដំណាក់កាលទី I រួមមាន៖
en-mt: The goals of the main forms reached by Phase I security research include:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: អាស៊ីតនុយក្លេអ៊ិច (DNA និង RNA) (អ្នកអភិវឌ្ឈដំណាក់កាលទីមួយ និងវ៉ាក់សាំងសាកល្បង៖ ម៉ូឌ័រណា (Moderna), mRNA-1273)
en-mt: Nuclear acid (DNA and RNA) (first phase developer and test vaccine: Moderna (Moderna), mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: កត្តាផ្ទុកវីរុស (អ្នកផលិត និងអ្នកសាកល្បងវ៉ាក់សាំងដំណាក់កាលទីមួយ៖ ក្រុមហ៊ុន CanSino Biologics, វីរុសអាដេណូប្រភេទ 5 វ៉ិចទ័រ)
en-mt: Virus storage factor (manufacturer and tester of the vaccine in the stage one: CanSino Biologics, 5 vector adeno virus)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: តាមការរាយការណ៍របស់ក្រុមអ្នកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រពី CEPI នៅខែមេសា មានវ៉ាក់សាំងសាកល្បងចំនួន 115 ស្ថិតនៅក្នុងដំណាក់កាលដំបូងនៃការអភិវឌ្ឍ ដោយមាន 78 វ៉ាក់សាំងត្រូវបានបញ្ជាក់ថាជាគម្រោងដែលកំពុងដំណើរការ (79 វ៉ាក់សាំង បើយោងតាម Milken Institute) 37 វ៉ាក់សាំងទៀតត្រូវបានប្រកាស ប៉ុន្តែព័ត៌មានជាសាធារណៈមានតិចតួចប៉ុណ្ណោះ (សន្មតជាមុនថាអ្វីៗស្ថិតក្នុងការរៀបគម្រោង និងការបង្កើត)។
en-mt: As reported by a team of scientists from CEPI in April, there are 115 test vaccines located in The early phase of development, with 78 vaccines confirmed as an ongoing project Work (79 vaccines, according to Milken Institute) 37 other vaccines have been announced, but only little public information (assumed in advance that things are in planning and creation).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: ការសាកល្បងដំណាក់កាលទី I-II ដឹកនាំការធ្វើតេស្តសុវត្ថិភាព និងភាពស៊ាំបឋម ជាធម្មតាដោយចៃដន្យ ថ្នាំមានការគ្រប់គ្រង និងនៅតាមកន្លែងជាច្រើន ខណៈពេលដែលកំណត់កម្រិតច្បាស់លាស់ និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
en-mt: Phase I-II tests lead primary safety and immune tests, usually randomly, drugs are controlled and across many places while setting clear and effective levels.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: ការសាកល្បងធ្វើតេស្តដំណាក់កាលទី II តម្រូវឱ្យមានអ្នកចូលរួមច្រើន រួមទាំងក្រុមត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងការធ្វើតេស្តប្រសិទ្ធភាពនៃវ៉ាក់សាំង ដើម្បីបង្ការជំងឺនានា នៅខណៈពេលកំពុងត្រួតពិនិត្យរកផលប៉ះពាល់អវិជ្ជមានក្នុងកម្រិតល្អបំផុត។
en-mt: Phase II testing requires a large number of attendees, including control groups and efficiency tests The possibility of a vaccine to prevent diseases while monitoring for negative effects at the best extent.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: ក្នុងចំណោមបេក្ខភាពវ៉ាក់សាំងចំនួន 79 ដែលកំពុងស្ថិតក្នុងដំណាក់កាលអភិវឌ្ឍសកម្ម (ត្រូវបានបញ្ជាក់នៅដើមខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020) បេក្ខភាពវ៉ាក់សាំង 74 មិនទាន់មាននៅក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃលើមនុស្សនៅឡើយទេ (កំពុងស្ថិតក្នុងការស្រាវជ្រាវ "មុនព្យាបាល")។
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates in the active development phase (confirmed in early April 2 020) 74 vaccine candidates are not yet available in human evaluation (under "pre-treatment") research.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 24 ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ 2020 នៅប្រទេសអូស្រ្តាលី សាកលវិទ្យាល័យឃ្វីនឡែនបានប្រកាសថាខ្លួនកំពុងស៊ើបអង្កេតសក្តានុពលនៃការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងម៉ូលេគុលដែលនឹងកែប្រែប្រូតេអ៊ីនវីរុសដើម្បីជំរុញឱ្យមានប្រតិកម្មភាពស៊ាំ។
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced itself investigating The potential for a molecular vaccine that will modify the protein virus to stimulate immune reactions.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: នៅល្បាក់ថ្ងៃទី 24 ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្នុងប្រទេសកាណាដា មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលវ៉ាក់សាំងអន្តរជាតិ (VIDO-InterVac) នៅសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ Saskatchewan បានប្រកាសអំពីការចាប់ផ្តើមការងារលើវ៉ាក់សាំងក្នុងគោលបំណងចាប់ផ្តើមធ្វើតេស្តលើមនុស្សនៅឆ្នាំ 2021។
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Center (VIDO-InterVac) at the Universal Saskatchewan High School has announced the start of work on the vaccine aimed at beginning human testing in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: គម្រោងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍វ៉ាក់សាំងបានប្រកាសនៅមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងបង្ការជំងឺឆ្លងប្រទេសចិន នៅថ្ងៃទី 26 ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ 2020 និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យហុងកុង នៅថ្ងៃទី 28 ខែមករា។
en-mt: Vaccine development project announced at Centers for Disease Control and Prevention China on January 26, 2020 and the University of Hong Kong on January 28.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 29 ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន Janssen Pharmaceutical ដែលដឹកនាំដោយអ្នកស្រី Hanneke Schuitemaker បានប្រកាសថាខ្លួនបានចាប់ផ្តើមធ្វើការអភិវឌ្ឍទៅលើវ៉ាក់សាំងហើយ។
en-mt: On January 29, 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical, led by Ms. Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that she had started development on the vaccine.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: ក្រុមហ៊ុនឱសថ Janssen កំពុងសហការអភិវឌ្ឍវ៉ាក់សាំងតាមមាត់ជាមួយដៃគូជីវបច្ចេកវិទ្យាគឺ ក្រុមហ៊ុន Vaxart។
en-mt: Janssen Pharmaceutical Company is collaborating on oral vaccine development with technological partners, Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 18 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន Emergent BioSolutions បានប្រកាសភាពជាដៃគូផលិតកម្មជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុន Vaxart ដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍវ៉ាក់សាំង។
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnering with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 8 ខែកុម្ភៈ ឆ្នាំ 2020 មន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ OncoGen ក្នុងប្រទេសរ៉ូម៉ានីបានបោះពុម្ពផ្សាយការបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំង ដែលមានបច្ចេកវិទ្យាស្រដៀងទៅនឹងថ្នាំសម្រាប់ព្យាបាល ដោយការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងមហារីកនីអូអាន់ទីហ្សែន (neoantigen)។
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, the OncoGen Laboratory in Romania published the development of available vaccines Technology is similar to a drug for treatment by vaccinating the neoantigen cancer vaccine.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 25 ខែមីនា ប្រធានវិទ្យាស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវបានប្រកាសថា ពួកគេ​បានបញ្ចប់ការសំយោគវ៉ាក់សាំង ហើយ​កំពុង​ចាប់ផ្តើម​ធ្វើតេស្ត។
en-mt: On March 25, the president of the Research Institute announced that they had completed vaccine synthesis and were beginning testing.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 27 ខែកុម្ភៈ ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology ដែល​ជាបុត្រសម្ព័ន្ធរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន Generex បានប្រកាសថា ពួកគេ​កំពុង​ចាប់ផ្ដើមគម្រោងថ្នាំវ៉ាក់សាំង ដើម្បីបង្កើតថ្នាំវ៉ាក់សាំង​ច្រវ៉ាក់អាមីណូ​អាស៊ីតលីឃី (Ii-Key ) ក្នុងការប្រឆាំងជំងឺ COVID-19 ។
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, a subsidiary of Generex, announced they were Start a vaccine project to develop a leaky amino acid chain vaccine (Ii-Key) in anti-DISEASE COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: ពួកគេចង់ផលិតបេក្ខភាពចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងដែលអាចធ្វើតេស្តលើមនុស្ស "ក្នុងរយៈពេល 90 ថ្ងៃ"។
en-mt: They want to produce a vaccine candidacy that can be tested on people "within 90 days."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 5 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវ៉ាស៊ីនតោន នៅសែនលូអ៊ីស បានប្រកាសគម្រោងរបស់ខ្លួន ដើម្បីបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំងមួយ។
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the University of Washington at Lois announced its plan to create a vaccine.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 5 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 កងពលសម្ភារ និងស្រាវជ្រាវវេជ្ជសាស្រ្តរបស់ទាហានសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិកនៅអង្គភាព Fort Detrick និងវិទ្យាស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវកងទ័ព Walter Reed ក្នុង Silver Spring ទាំងនៅភាគខាងលិចរដ្ឋ Maryland បានប្រកាសថា ពួកគេបាននិងកំពុងធ្វើការបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំង។
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the U.S. soldier's medical materials and research army at Fort Detrick and Vietnamese Community The Walter Reed Army Research Station in Silver Spring in both western Maryland has announced that they have and are developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 10 មីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន Emergent Biosolutions បានប្រកាសថា ខ្លួនបានសហការជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុន Novavax Inc។
en-mt: On March 10, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had collaborated with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: ក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍ និងការ​ផលិតវ៉ាក់សាំង។
en-mt: In the development and production of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: ដៃគូសហការណ៍បានប្រកាសផែនការបន្ថែមទៀតសម្រាប់ការធ្វើតេស្តស្វែងរក និងសាកល្បងព្យាបាលដំណាក់កាលទី I នៅខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ 2020។
en-mt: Partners announced additional plans for Phase I search and treatment testing in July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 12 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រសួងសុខាភិបាលប្រទេសឥណ្ឌាបានប្រកាសថា ពួកគេកំពុងធ្វើការជាមួយមនុស្សដែលត្រូវបានដាក់ឱ្យនៅដាច់ដោយឡែកចំនួន 11 នាក់ ហើយសូម្បីតែផ្លូវដែលលឿនក៏ដោយក៏ត្រូវការចំណាយពេលយ៉ាងតិចប្រហែលមួយឆ្នាំកន្លះទៅពីរឆ្នាំដែរ ដើម្បីបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំង។
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, the Indian Ministry of Health announced that they were working with people placed in isolation Four 11, and even the fast track, takes at least about a year and a half to two years to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 12 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន Medicago ដែលជាក្រុមហ៊ុនបច្ចេកវិទ្យាជីវសាស្រ្តនៅទីក្រុង Quebec បានធ្វើសេចក្តីរាយការណ៍អំពីការបង្កើតភាគល្អិតដូចវីរុសកូរ៉ូណា ក្រោមជំនួយថវិកាមួយផ្នែកពីវិទ្យាស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវសុខភាពកាណាដា។
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, Medicago, a technology company in Quebec Reports of the formation of cholera-like particles under a partial budget grant from the Canadian Institute of Health Research.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: វ៉ាក់សាំងសាកល្បងកំពុងស្ថិតក្នុងការស្រាវជ្រាវក្នុងមន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ ដោយមានគម្រោងធ្វើតេស្តនៅខែកក្កដា ឬសីហា ឆ្នាំ 2020។
en-mt: The test vaccine is undergoing research in the lab, with plans to test in July or August 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: នៅដើមសប្ដាហ៍នោះ សារព័ត៌មាន The Guardian បានរាយការណ៍ថា​ប្រធានាធិបតីអាមេរិកលោកដូណាល់ត្រាំបានផ្ដល់ឲ្យក្រុមហ៊ុន CureVac នូវ “‘ទឹកប្រាក់ដ៏ច្រើន’ ដើម្បី​ទទួលបាន​សិទ្ធិផ្ដាច់មុខ​ក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់​វ៉ាក់សាំង Covid-19” ដែលរដ្ឋាភិបាល​ប្រទេសអាល្លឺម៉ង់​បានតវ៉ាប្រឆាំង​នឹង​សកម្មភាព​នេះ។
en-mt: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that US President Donald Trump had given CureVac a "water' A large sum of money 'to get the exclusive right to use the Covid-19 vaccine" that the German government has protested against the action.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 17 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុនថ្នាំអាមេរិក Pfizer បានប្រកាសថានឹងធ្វើជាដៃគូជាមួយក្រុមហ៊ុនអាល្លឺម៉ង់ BioNTech ក្នុងគោលបំណងផលិតវ៉ាក់សាំងដែលផ្អែកលើ mRNA។
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, American drug company Pfizer announced that it would partner with German company BioNTech in an attempt to manufacture mRNA-based vaccines.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: វ៉ាក់សាំងសាកល្បងផ្អែកលើ mRNA គឺ BNT162 ឥឡូវនេះកំពុងរៀបចំត្រៀមធ្វើតេស្តក្នុងការសិក្សាព្យាបាលសាកល្បង ដែលរំពឹងទុកថាចាប់ផ្ដើមនៅខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020។
en-mt: The test vaccine based on mRNA, BNT162, is now preparing for a trial study expected to begin in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: នៅប្រទេសអ៊ីតាលី នៅថ្ងៃទី 17 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន Takis Biotech ដែលជាក្រុមហ៊ុនជីវគីមីអ៊ីតាលី បានប្រកាសថាពួកគេនឹងមានលទ្ធផលធ្វើតេស្តគ្លីនិកជាមុនក្នុងខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ហើយវ៉ាក់សាំងចុងក្រោយរបស់ពួកគេអាចចាប់ផ្តើមធ្វើតេស្តលើមនុស្សនៅរដូវស្លឹកឈើជ្រុះ។
en-mt: In Italy on March 17, 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biochemical company, announced them There are preliminary clinical test results in April 2020 and their final vaccine could begin human testing in the autumn.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: នៅប្រទេសបារាំង នៅថ្ងៃទី 19 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ក្រុមហ៊ុន CEPI បានប្រកាសការវិនិយោគចំនួន 4.9 លានដុល្លារអាមេរិកនៅក្នុងសម្ព័ន្ធស្រាវជ្រាវវ៉ាក់សាំងជំងឺ COVID-19 ទាក់ទងនឹងវិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រ វិទ្យាស្ថានជីវសាស្រ្តតេមីស (ទីក្រុងវីយែន ប្រទេសអូទ្រីស) និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ Pittsburgh ដែលនាំឱ្យមានការវិនិយោគសរុបរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន CEPI នៅក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍវ៉ាក់សាំងជំងឺ COVID-19 ដល់ 29 លានដុល្លារ។
en-mt: In France on March 19, 2020, CEPI announced 4.9 million investments US dollar in COVID-19 vaccine research tribunal related to Pastor Institute The Institute of Biological Testimony (Vienna, Austria) and Pittsburgh University, which leads to work CEPI company's total investment in the development of the COVID-19 vaccine to 29 million dollars.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: ដៃគូវិនិយោគផ្សេងទៀតរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន CEPI សម្រាប់ការបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំងជំងឺ COVID-19 គឺមានដូចជាក្រុមហ៊ុន Moderna ក្រុមហ៊ុន Curevac ក្រុមហ៊ុន Inovio ក្រុមហ៊ុន Novavax សាកលវិទ្យាល័យហុងកុង សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ Oxford និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ Queensland។
en-mt: Other investment company CEPI companies for the development of the COVID-19 vaccine are included in moderna companies Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, University of Hong Kong, Oxford University and Queensland University.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 20 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 មន្ត្រីសុខាភិបាលរុស្ស៊ីបានប្រកាសថាអ្នកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្របានចាប់ផ្តើមការធ្វើតេស្តសត្វដោយប្រើបេក្ខភាពវ៉ាក់សាំងចំនួនប្រាំមួយផ្សេងគ្នា។
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists had begun animal testing using six different vaccines.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: អ្នកស្រាវជ្រាវនៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យ Imperial College London បាន​ប្រកាសនៅថ្ងៃទី 20 ខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 ថាពួកគេកំពុងបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំង ដែលអាចពង្រីកខ្លួនឯងបាន គឺវ៉ាក់សាំង RNA សម្រាប់ជំងឺ​ COVID-19។
en-mt: Researchers at Imperial College London College announced on March 20 2020 That they are developing a self-extendable vaccine, the RNA vaccine for COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: វ៉ាក់សាំងសាកល្បងត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងក្នុងរយៈពេល 14 ថ្ងៃបន្ទាប់ពីទទួលបានពីប្រទេសចិន។
en-mt: The test vaccine was developed within 14 days of being obtained from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: នៅចុងខែមីនា រដ្ឋាភិបាលប្រទេសកាណាដាបានប្រកាសផ្តល់ថវិកាចំនួន 275 លានដុល្លារកាណាដាសម្រាប់គម្រោងស្រាវជ្រាវចំនួន 96 ស្តីពីវិធានការវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រប្រឆាំងនឹង COVID-19 រួមទាំងបេក្ខភាពវ៉ាក់សាំងជាច្រើននៅតាមក្រុមហ៊ុន និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យប្រទេសកាណាដា ដូចជាគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមរបស់មេឌីហ្គាកូ និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យសាសាកាឆេវ៉ាន់។
en-mt: In late March, the Canadian government announced a funding of 275 million Canadian dollars for 96 research projects on medical measures against CO VID-19, including many vaccine candidates in Canadian companies and universities, such as the Initiative of Medigaco and the University of Saskatchewan.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: ស្របពេលជាមួយគ្នានេះ រដ្ឋាភិបាលកាណាដាបានប្រកាសផ្តល់ទឹកប្រាក់ចំនួន 192 លានដុល្លារកាណាដា ដោយផ្តោតសំខាន់ជាពិសេសទៅលើការបង្កើតវ៉ាក់សាំងប្រឆាំងនឹងជំងឺ COVID-19 ជាមួយផែនការបង្កើត “ធនាគារវ៉ាក់សាំង” ថ្នាក់ជាតិនៃវ៉ាក់សាំងថ្មីៗជាច្រើនដែលអាចនឹងប្រើបាន ប្រសិនបើវាមានការផ្ទុះឡើងនៃវីរុសមួយផ្សេងទៀត។
en-mt: At the same time, the Canadian government has announced 192 million Canadian dollars, focusing specifically on developing a vaccine against COVI D-19 with a plan to create a national "vaccine bank" of many new vaccines that could be used if it had an outbreak of another virus.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: នៅថ្ងៃទី 2 ខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 អ្នកស្រាវជ្រាវនៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រនៃសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ Pittsburgh បានរាយការណ៍អំពីការធ្វើតេស្ត PittCoVacc ដែលអាចជាវ៉ាក់សាំង COVID-19 ទៅលើសត្វកណ្តុរដោយបញ្ជាក់ថា “MNA បានបញ្ជូនវ៉ាក់សាំងរងសម្រាប់ SARS-CoV-2 S1 ដែលចម្រាញ់នូវការឆ្លើយតបនៃអង្គបដិប្រាណជាក់លាក់សម្រាប់អង់ទីហ្សែនខ្លាំង [នៅក្នុងសត្វកណ្តុរ] ដែលជាក់ស្តែង ចាប់ពី 2 សប្តាហ៍ បន្ទាប់ពីការចាក់ថ្នាំបង្ការរោគ។
en-mt: April 2, 2020 Researchers at the University of Pitt Medical Collegesburgh reported on a PittCoVacc test that could be a COVID-19 vaccine on rats, stating "MNA Transmitted a sub-vacuum for SARS-CoV-2 S1 that enriches specific political responses for A Strong genes [in rats] that are evident from 2 weeks after vaccination.

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: នៅប្រទេសកាណាដា នៅថ្ងៃទី 16 ខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 សាកលវិទ្យាល័យនៃសាលាឱសថវ៉ាធើឡូ បានប្រកាសអំពីការរចនាបេក្ខភាពវ៉ាក់សាំងដែលមានមូលដ្ឋានជាឌីអិនអេ ដែលអាចជាថ្នាំបាញ់ច្រមុះ។
en-mt: In Canada on April 16, 2020, the University of Vatherlo School of Pharmacy announced the design of a DNA-based vaccine that could be a nose spray.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

en-mt: By using DNA bacteria, DNA will be designed to copy in human bacteria to produce particles, much more viruses There is no danger that can prompt the immune system to produce a political production against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: នៅខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ 2020 រដ្ឋាភិបាលសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិក ក្រុមហ៊ុនឧស្សាហកម្ម និងសាកលវិទ្យាល័យធំៗចំនួនបីបានប្រមូលផ្ដុំគ្នា ដើម្បីប្រើប្រាស់កំពូលកុំព្យូទ័រ (super computer) របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន IBM រួមជាមួយធនធានផ្ទុកទិន្នន័យនៅលើអាកាសរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft និង Google។
en-mt: In March 2020, the United States government, three major industrial companies and universities brought together for the top use IBM company's computer (super computer) along with on-air data resources of Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft and Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.

en-mt: Some vaccines have species linked effects or so-called non-specific effects.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.

en-mt: That means they can have benefits beyond the diseases they protect.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: ការសិក្សាតាមរបៀបចៃដន្យមួយក្នុងប្រទេសអូស្ត្រាលីកំពុងចុះឈ្មោះបុគ្គលិកសុខាភិបាលចំនួន 4,170 នាក់ឱ្យចូលសិក្សា។
en-mt: A random fashion study in Australia is registering 4,170 health workers to study.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: ការសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវថ្មីៗនេះពីប្រសិទ្ធភាពវ៉ាក់សាំងក្នុងការទប់ស្កាត់ COVID-19 ទៅលើ ACE2-transgenic របស់សត្វ ដូចជាសត្វកណ្ដុរ សត្វនៅក្នុងមន្ទីរពិសោធន៏ផ្សេងៗទៀត ក៏ដូចជាថនិកសត្វមិនមែនមនុស្ស ការធ្វើទាំងអស់នេះគឺសម្រាប់សុវត្ថិភាពជីវសាស្រ្តកម្រិតទី 3 ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងវីរុសរស់ និងការសម្របសម្រួលជាអន្តរជាតិ ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវនីតិវិធីសុវត្ថិភាពស្តង់ដារ។
en-mt: Recent studies of vaccine effective in blocking COVID-19 on animals' ACE2-transgenic, such as rats, rats, in other laboratories as well as white mammals Animals, not humans, all these doings are for level 3 biological safety in the management of life viruses and international coordination to ensure standard security procedures.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: ការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងប្រឆាំងនឹងជំងឺ SARS និង MERS ត្រូវបានធ្វើតេស្តក្នុងគំរូសត្វ មិនមែនមនុស្សទេ។
en-mt: Vaccinations against SARS and MERS have been tested in animal models, not humans.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: នៅត្រឹមឆ្នាំ 2020 មិនមានការព្យាបាល ឬវ៉ាក់សាំងការពារជំងឺ SARS ដែលត្រូវបានបង្ហាញថាមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពចំពោះមនុស្សទេ។
en-mt: By 2020, there are no treatments or SARS prevention vaccines that have been shown to be safe and effective for humans.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: យោងទៅតាមការស្រាវជ្រាវដែលបានចេញផ្សាយក្នុងឆ្នាំ 2005 និង 2006 ការកំណត់អត្តសញ្ញាណ និងការអភិវឌ្ឍវ៉ាក់សាំង ឬថ្នាំព្យាបាលនៃជំងឺ SARS គឺជាអាទិភាពចម្បងរបស់រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាល និងភ្នាក់ងារសុខភាពសាធារណៈនៅជុំវិញពិភពលោក។ គេក៏មិនមានវ៉ាក់សាំងប្រឆាំងនឹងជំងឺ MERS ដែរ។
en-mt: According to research released in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of vaccines or therapies of SAR S is a major priority of government and public health agencies around the globe; they do not have a vaccine against MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: នៅពេលដែលជំងឺ MERS ឆ្លងរាលដាល ការស្រាវជ្រាវជំងឺសារ ដែល​មាន​ស្រាប់​ត្រូវបានគេជឿថា ​អាចផ្ដល់នូវគំរូ​ជាប្រយោជន៍​មួយ​សម្រាប់​ការ​អភិវឌ្ឍន៍វ៉ាក់សាំង និងវិធីព្យាបាលប្រឆាំងនឹងការឆ្លង MERS-CoV ។
en-mt: When MERS is contagionated, existing messaging disease research is believed to provide samples It is a benefit for the development of vaccines and treatments against MERS-CoV infections.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: គិតត្រឹមខែមីនា ឆ្នាំ​ 2020 មានថ្នាំវ៉ាក់សាំងជំងឺ MERS មួយ (ផ្អែកតាម DNA) ដែលបានបញ្ចប់ការសាកល្បងព្យាបាលដំណាក់កាលទីមួយទៅលើមនុស្ស ហើយការសាកល្បងព្យាបាលដំណាក់បីផ្សេងទៀតស្ថិតក្នុងដំណើរការ ដែលពួកវាទាំងអស់ជាវ៉ាក់សាំង ដែលប្រើមេរោគជាភ្នាក់ងារ។ ក្នុងនោះ មានពីរជាអេឌីណូវាយរ៉ាល់ វ៉ិចទ័រ (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac) និងមួយទៀត ជាអ៊ិមវីអេ វ៉ិចទ័រ (MVA-MERS-S)។
en-mt: As of March 2020, there was an MERS vaccine (based on DNA), which completed the first phase trial in humans and a stage treatment trial Others are in the process where they are all vaccines used as agents. BVRS-GamVac and the other is an MVA Vector (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: ការផ្សព្វផ្សាយតាមបណ្តាញសង្គមបានបង្ហាញពីទ្រឹស្តីសមគំនិតមួយ ដោយអះអាងថាវីរុសនៅពីក្រោយជំងឺ COVID-19 ត្រូវបានរកឃើញហើយ និងថាវ៉ាក់សាំងមួយក៏មានរួចហើយដែរ។
en-mt: Social media advertising has revealed a conspiracy theory, claiming that the virus behind COVID-19 has already been detected and that a vaccine is already available.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: ប៉ាតង់នានាដែលបានដកស្រង់ចេញពីការបង្ហោះតាមប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គមផ្ដល់សេចក្ដីយោងអំពីប៉ាតង់ដែលមានស្រាប់អំពីលំដាប់ហ្សែន និងវ៉ាក់សាំងសម្រាប់វីរុសកូរ៉ូណាផ្សេងទៀតដូចជាវីរុសកូរ៉ូណា SARS ជាដើម។
en-mt: Patents quoted from social media posts offer references to existing patents Genetic sequences and vaccines for other cholera viruses, like SARS, cancer.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ជំងឺប៊ីវីរុស​កូរ៉ូណា 2019 ​(COVID-19) បង្កឱ្យ​មាន​វិបត្ដិ​ផ្លូវ​ដង្ហើម​ធ្ងន់ធ្ងរ​បង្ក​ដោយ​វីរុសកូរ៉ូណា​ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ។
en-mt: The 2019 Corona virus (COVID-19) causes severe respiratory disease (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: រោគសញ្ញា​ទូទៅរួមមានគ្រុនក្តៅ ក្អក និងការដកដង្ហើមខ្លីៗ។
en-mt: Common symptoms include choppy fever, cough and short breath.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: រោគសញ្ញាផ្សេងទៀតអាចមានដូចជា អស់កម្លាំង ឈឺសាច់ដុំ រាគរូស ឈឺបំពង់ក មិនអាចហិតដឹងក្លិន និងឈឺពោះ។
en-mt: Other symptoms can include fatigue, muscle pain, ocean pain, throat pain, unable to know the smell and stomach pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: រយៈពេលក្រោយពីមានការប៉ះពាល់រហូត​ដល់​ចេញរោគសញ្ញាដំបូង គឺប្រហែលជាប្រាំថ្ងៃ ប៉ុន្តែវាអាចមានរយៈពេលពីពីរទៅដប់បួនថ្ងៃ។
en-mt: The period after exposure to the initial symptoms is about five days, but it can last two to fourteen days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: ខណៈពេលដែលករណីភាគច្រើនបណ្តាលឱ្យមានរោគសញ្ញាស្រាល អ្នកខ្លះវិវឌ្ឍទៅជាជំងឺរលាកសួតដោយសារវីរុស និងការខូចពហុសរីរាង្គ។
en-mt: While most cases cause mild symptoms, some develop into pneumonia from viruses and organic failure.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: គិតត្រឹមថ្ងៃទី 17 ខែមេសា ឆ្នាំ 2020 មានករណីជាង 2.24 លាន​ករណីត្រូវបានគេរាយការណ៍នៅទូទាំង 210 ប្រទេស និងតំបន់ដែលបណ្តាលឱ្យមនុស្សស្លាប់ជាង 153,000 នាក់។
en-mt: As of April 17, 2020, more than 2.24 million cases were reported across 210 countries and regions, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.

en-mt: More than 568,000 people have already recovered; the virus is primarily spread between humans and humans at their time There are often close-knit relations via small drops of water produced by coughing, mushrooms or talking.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: នៅពេលដំណក់ទឹកទាំងនេះត្រូវបានផលិត នៅពេល​ដកដង្ហើមចេញ ជាធម្មតាវាធ្លាក់ដល់ដី ឬលើផ្ទៃដី​ជាជាង​ឆ្លង​ពី​ចម្ងាយឆ្ងាយ។
en-mt: When these water droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or on the surface rather than pass remotely.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: មនុស្សយើងត្រូវបានឆ្លងជំងឺឆ្លងនេះ ដោយសារ​មាន​ការប៉ះពាល់​ផ្ទៃ​ដែល​​មាន​ផ្ទុកមេរោគ បន្ទាប់មកទៀតប៉ះពាល់ភ្នែក ច្រមុះ និង​មាត់​របស់​ពួកគេ។
en-mt: People are infected with this disease because of an infected surface, then affecting their eyes, noses and mouths.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: វាគឺងាយឆ្លងបំផុតក្នុងអំឡុង​ពេលបីថ្ងៃដំបូង បន្ទាប់ពី​ចេញ​រោគសញ្ញា មានន័យថា ការឆ្លងអាចមានមុនពេលចេញរោគសញ្ញា ឬក៏​ដំណាក់​កាលផ្សេងៗនៃជំងឺ។ ​វិធី​ក្នុង​ការធ្វើរោគ​វិនិច្ឆ័យ​តាម​ស្តង់ដារ គឺការ​​រាប់​មេរោគលើប្រតិកម្មខ្សែប៉ូលីមេរាសចម្លង​​បញ្ច្រាស​ទៅតាម​ពេល​វេលា​​ជាក់ស្តែង (rRT-PCR) យកបានពីសំណាកនៅច្រមុះ និង​បំពង់ក។
en-mt: It is most transmitted during the initial three days after symptoms are out, meaning infections can be preceded by symptoms or different stages of disease. Judging by the standards is the counting of the virus on the reaction of the polymera reverse in reverse (rRT-PCR) from samples in the nose and throat.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: ការប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស​ត្រូវ​បានណែនាំ​សម្រាប់​អ្នក​ដែល​សង្ស័យ​ថាពួក​គេមានផ្ទុកវីរុស និងអ្នកមើលថែទាំ​របស់​ពួកគេ។

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.

en-mt: Local disease is recorded in most countries across the six regions of the six regions of the Organisation.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: អ្នកដែលឆ្លងវីរុសនេះអាចមានមានអាការៈមិនអ្វីឡើយ ឬវិវត្តទៅជារោគសញ្ញាដូចជាផ្តាសាយ ដូចជាគ្រុនក្តៅ ក្អក អស់កម្លាំង និងដកដង្ហើមខ្លី។

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: រោគសញ្ញាអាសន្ន រួមមានការពិបាកដកដង្ហើម ឈឺទ្រូង ឬរងសម្ពាធជាប់រហូត ច្របូកច្របល់ ពិបាកភ្ញាក់ និង​ងងឹតមុខ ឬបបូរមាត់ខៀវ។ ការយក​ចិត្តទុកដាក់​ខាង​វេជ្ជសាស្ត្រភ្លាមៗត្រូវបានណែនាំ ប្រសិនបើ​មាន​រោគ​សញ្ញា​ទាំងនេះ។
en-mt: Asthma symptoms include difficulty breathing, chest pain or persistent pressure, confusion, difficulty Immediate medical attention is introduced if there are any of these symptoms.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: រោគសញ្ញាផ្លូវដង្ហើមខាងលើនោះមានដូចជា ផ្តាសាយ ហៀរសំបោរ ឬឈឺក។
en-mt: The above respiratory symptoms include flu, spill or pain.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: រោគសញ្ញានៃជម្ងឺក្រពះពោះវៀនដូចជា ចង្អោរ ក្អួត និងរាគ ត្រូវបានគេសង្កេតឃើញមានអត្រាខុសគ្នា។
en-mt: Symptoms of gastrointestinal diseases, like pneumonia, nausea, and diarrhea have been observed at different rates.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: ករណីមួយ​ចំនួននៅប្រទេសចិន ជាដំបូងបង្ហាញតែការតឹងទ្រូង និងញ័រដើមទ្រូងប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
en-mt: Some cases in China initially show only chest tensions and chests.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: ក្នុងករណីខ្លះ ជំងឺ​នេះអាចវិវត្ត​ទៅជា​ជំងឺ​រលាក​សួត ខូចពហុសរីរាង្គ និងស្លាប់។
en-mt: In some cases, the disease can evolve into pneumonia, damage to organs and die.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: រយៈពេល COVID-19 ចេញរោគសញ្ញាក្រោយពីមានការឆ្លងនូវមេរោគនេះត្រូវប្រើពេលប្រាំទៅប្រាំមួយថ្ងៃ ប៉ុន្តែវាក៏អាចចេញរោគសញ្ញាចន្លោះពីថ្ងៃទីពីរដល់ថ្ងៃទី 14 ដែរ។
en-mt: The COVID-19 period releases symptoms after contracting the virus takes five to six days, but it can also release symptoms between the second and 14th days.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: 97.5% នៃមនុស្ស​ដែលវិវត្តទៅជា​រោគសញ្ញា​នឹងមាន​ស្ថានភាព​​ដូច្នោះ​​ក្នុង​រយៈពេល 11.5 ថ្ងៃនៃការឆ្លង។ របាយការណ៍បាន​បង្ហាញថា មិន​មែន​អ្នកដែល​ឆ្លងរោគ​ទាំងអស់​សុទ្ធ​តែវិវត្តរោគ​សញ្ញា​នោះទេ។
en-mt: 97.5% of people who evolve into symptoms will have the same condition within 11.5 days of infection.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: តួនាទីរបស់ក្រុមចម្លងដែលមិនបញ្ចេញរោគសញ្ញាទាំងនេះនៅក្នុងការបញ្ជូនចម្លងមិនទាន់ត្រូវបានគេដឹងច្បាស់នៅឡើយទេ។ ទោះយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ ភស្តុតាងបឋមបង្ហាញថា ពួកគេអាចចូលរួមចំណែកក្នុងការរីករាលដាលនៃជំងឺនេះ។
en-mt: The role of these non-symptomatic transmission groups in the transmission is not yet known However, basic evidence suggests they can contribute to the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: សមាមាត្រនៃអ្នកឆ្លងមេរោគដែលមិនបានបង្ហាញរោគសញ្ញាបច្ចុប្បន្នមិនទាន់ត្រូវបានគេដឹងនោះទេ និង​កំពុងត្រូវ​បាន​សិក្សា មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលកូរ៉េសម្រាប់ការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និង​ការពារ​ជំងឺ (KCDC) រាយការណ៍ថា 20% នៃ​ករណីឆ្លង​ទាំងអស់​នៅ​តែមិនមានរោគសញ្ញាអំឡុងពេលស្នាក់នៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យ។
en-mt: The ratio of infections who have not shown current certificates of symptoms is not yet known and is being studied the Korea Center Monitoring and Prevention of Diseases (KCDC) reports that 20% of all infection cases still have no symptoms during their hospital stay.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: គណៈកម្មការសុខភាពជាតិរបស់ចិន បាន​ចាប់ផ្តើម​រាប់​បញ្ចូលទាំងករណីមិនមានបង្ហាញរោគសញ្ញា នៅក្នុង​ករណី​ប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់ខ្លួន​កាលពីថ្ងៃទី 1 ខែមេសា ក្នុង​ចំណោម​​ការឆ្លងចំនួន 166 ករណីនៅថ្ងៃនោះ ដែលមាន 130 (78%) ករណី​​មិនបង្ហាញ​រោគសញ្ញា​នៅពេល​ធ្វើតេស្ត។
en-mt: China's National Health Commission began including cases of no symptoms in its daily case as of 1 April of the 166 infections that day, 130 (78%) cases do not show symptoms at testing.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.

en-mt: Both cowards and water can carry a lot of viruses.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.

en-mt: The CDC recommends brushing the mouth and nose with paper, washing mouths when bucking or mouse, and recommends using the inside of the elbow if there is no mouthpiece.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.

en-mt: Hand hygiene properly, and then coughing or mouse is encouraged.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: CDC បានផ្តល់អនុសាសន៍ឱ្យប្រើក្រណាត់បិទបាំងមុខនៅតាមទីសាធារណៈ ដែលជាផ្នែកមួយក្នុងការកំរិតការចម្លងមេរោគពីបុគ្គល ដែលគ្មានរោគសញ្ញា។ វិធីសាស្រ្តគម្លាតសង្គមមានគោលបំណងកាត់បន្ថយការប៉ះពាល់អ្នកឆ្លងទៅកាន់ហ្វូងមនុស្ស តាមរយៈការបិទសាលារៀន និង​ទីកន្លែងធ្វើការ ការរឹតត្បិតការធ្វើដំណើរ និងលុបចោលការជួបជុំសាធារណៈធំៗជាដើម។
en-mt: The CDC recommends the use of hidden fabrics in public places as part of limiting the transmission of viruses from individuals without symptoms. The goal of reducing the exposure of cross-crowds by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and canceling large public gatherings.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: គោលការណ៍ណែនាំស្តីពីការរក្សា​គម្លាត​ ក៏រាប់​បញ្ចូល​ផង​ដែរ​ថា មនុស្ស​រក្សាគម្លាត​ដាច់ឆ្ងាយពីគ្នាយ៉ាងតិច 6 ហ្វីត (1.8 ម)។

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: មិនមានថ្នាំណាមួយត្រូវបានគេដឹងថាមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពក្នុងការបង្ការការពារជំងឺ COVID-19 ទេ។ ដោយសារវ៉ាក់សាំងមិនត្រូវបានគេរំពឹងទុកថានឹងរកឃើញនៅឡើយទេរហូតដល់ឆ្នាំ 2021 ផ្នែកសំខាន់នៃការគ្រប់គ្រង COVID-19 គឺការព្យាយាមកាត់បន្ថយកម្រិតខ្ពស់បំផុតនៃជំងឺរាតត្បាត ដែលត្រូវបានគេស្គាល់ថាជា “ការបង្រួមខ្សែកោង” ។
en-mt: No drug is known to be effective in preventing COVID-19. Because the vaccine is not expected to be found until the year 2021 The key part of COVID-19 management is trying to reduce the highest levels of pandemics, known as "curve contraction."

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.

en-mt: The CDC also recommends that individuals frequently wash their hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds Especially after entering the toilet or when his hands are visible before eating and after brushing their nose, nausea or mouse.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.

en-mt: The organisation adds the use of alkaline hand washing water containing at least 60% of alcohol, but when it is not possible to use soap and water For areas that do not have hand-washing water, the People's Health Organisation provides two formulas for local manufacturing.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.

en-mt: Humans are supervised by help care, which can include treatment with fluids, providing oxygen and helping reach other important organisms suffering from disease.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.

en-mt: Extracorporeal oxygen absorption (ECMO) is used to address the problem of respiratory failure, but its benefits remain in consideration.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
